solvency_ii.query: SELECT T2.product_name, COUNT(T1.event_id) FROM products_in_events AS T1 JOIN products AS T2 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id GROUP BY T2.product_id

solvency_ii.question: Show the names of products and the number of events they are in, sorted by the number of events in descending order.
solvency_ii.query: SELECT T2.product_name, COUNT(T1.event_id) AS num_events FROM products_in_events AS T1 JOIN products AS T2 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id GROUP BY T1.product_id ORDER BY num_events DESC

solvency_ii.question: Show the names of products that are in at least two events.
solvency_ii.query: SELECT DISTINCT T3.Product_Name FROM Products_in_Events AS T1 JOIN Events AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID = T2.Event_ID JOIN Products AS T3 ON T1.Product_ID = T3.Product_ID GROUP BY T3.Product_ID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T2.Event_ID) >= 2

solvency_ii.question: Show the names of products that are in at least two events in ascending alphabetical order of product name.
solvency_ii.query: SELECT T3.Product_Name FROM Products_in_Events AS T1 JOIN Events AS T2 ON T1.Event_ID = T2.Event_ID JOIN Products AS T3 ON T1.Product_ID = T3.Product_ID GROUP BY T3.Product_ID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T2.Event_ID) >= 2 ORDER BY T3.Product_Name ASC

solvency_ii.question: List the names of products that are not in any event.
solvency_ii.query: SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE product_id NOT IN (SELECT product_id FROM products_in_events)

entertainment_awards.question: How many artworks are there?
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT count(*) FROM artwork

entertainment_awards.question: List the name of artworks in ascending alphabetical order.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT Name FROM artwork ORDER BY Name ASC

entertainment_awards.question: List the name of artworks whose type is not "Program Talent Show".
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT Name FROM artwork WHERE Type != 'Program Talent Show'

entertainment_awards.question: What are the names and locations of festivals?
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT Festival_Name ,  Location FROM festival_detail

entertainment_awards.question: What are the names of the chairs of festivals, sorted in ascending order of the year held?
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT Chair_Name FROM festival_detail ORDER BY Year ASC

entertainment_awards.question: What is the location of the festival with the largest number of audience?
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT location FROM festival_detail WHERE num_of_audience = (SELECT MAX(num_of_audience) FROM festival_detail)

entertainment_awards.question: What are the names of festivals held in year 2007?
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT Festival_Name FROM festival_detail WHERE Year = 2007

entertainment_awards.question: What is the average number of audience for festivals?
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT AVG(Num_of_Audience) FROM festival_detail

entertainment_awards.question: Show the names of the three most recent festivals.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT Festival_Name FROM festival_detail ORDER BY Year DESC LIMIT 3

entertainment_awards.question: For each nomination, show the name of the artwork and name of the festival where it is nominated.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT T2.Name, T1.Festival_Name FROM nomination AS N JOIN festival_detail AS T1 ON N.Festival_ID = T1.Festival_ID JOIN artwork AS T2 ON N.Artwork_ID = T2.Artwork_ID

entertainment_awards.question: Show distinct types of artworks that are nominated in festivals in 2007.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.type FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.artwork_id = T2.artwork_id JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.festival_id = T3.festival_id WHERE T3.year = 2007

entertainment_awards.question: Show the names of artworks in ascending order of the year they are nominated in.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT T2.Name FROM nomination AS T1 JOIN artwork AS T2 ON T1.Artwork_ID  =  T2.Artwork_ID JOIN festival_detail AS T3 ON T1.Festival_ID  =  T3.Festival_ID ORDER BY T3.Year ASC

entertainment_awards.question: Show the names of festivals that have nominated artworks of type "Program Talent Show".
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT T1.Festival_Name FROM festival_detail AS T1 JOIN nomination AS T2 ON T1.Festival_ID = T2.Festival_ID JOIN artwork AS T3 ON T2.Artwork_ID = T3.Artwork_ID WHERE T3.Type = "Program Talent Show"

entertainment_awards.question: Show the ids and names of festivals that have at least two nominations for artworks.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT T1.Festival_ID, T1.Festival_Name FROM festival_detail AS T1 JOIN nomination AS T2 ON T1.Festival_ID = T2.Festival_ID GROUP BY T1.Festival_ID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T2.Artwork_ID) >= 2

entertainment_awards.question: Show the id, name of each festival and the number of artworks it has nominated.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT T1.Festival_ID, T1.Festival_Name, COUNT(T2.Artwork_ID) FROM festival_detail AS T1 LEFT JOIN nomination AS T2 ON T1.Festival_ID = T2.Festival_ID GROUP BY T1.Festival_ID

entertainment_awards.question: Please show different types of artworks with the corresponding number of artworks of each type.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT Type, COUNT(*) FROM artwork GROUP BY Type

entertainment_awards.question: List the most common type of artworks.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT Type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM artwork GROUP BY Type ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 1

entertainment_awards.question: List the year in which there are more than one festivals.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT year FROM festival_detail GROUP BY year HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

entertainment_awards.question: List the name of artworks that are not nominated.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT Name FROM artwork WHERE Artwork_ID NOT IN (SELECT Artwork_ID FROM nomination)

entertainment_awards.question: Show the number of audience in year 2008 or 2010.
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT SUM(Num_of_Audience) FROM festival_detail WHERE Year = 2008 OR Year = 2010

entertainment_awards.question: What are the total number of the audiences who visited any of the festivals?
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT SUM(Num_of_Audience) FROM festival_detail

entertainment_awards.question: In which year are there festivals both inside the 'United States' and outside the 'United States'?
entertainment_awards.query: SELECT T1.year FROM festival_detail AS T1 JOIN festival_detail AS T2 ON T1.year  =  T2.year AND T1.location  =  'United States' AND T2.location  !=  'United States'

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: What are all the distinct premise types?
Find the types and details for all premises and order by the premise type.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT premises_type, premise_details FROM premises ORDER BY premises_type

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: Show each premise type and the number of premises in that type.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT premises_type, count(*) FROM premises GROUP BY premises_type

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: Show all distinct product categories along with the number of mailshots in each category.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT product_category, count(DISTINCT mailshot_id) FROM mailshot_campaigns GROUP BY product_category

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: Show the name and phone of the customer without any mailshot.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM mailshot_customers)

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: Show the name and phone for customers with a mailshot with outcome code 'No Response'.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT T1.customer_name, T1.customer_phone FROM customers AS T1 JOIN mailshot_customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.outcome_code = 'No Response'

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: Show the outcome code of mailshots along with the number of mailshots in each outcome code.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT outcome_code, count(*) FROM mailshot_customers GROUP BY outcome_code

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: Show the names of customers who have at least 2 mailshots with outcome code 'Order'.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN mailshot_customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id JOIN mailshot_campaigns AS T3 ON T2.mailshot_id  =  T3.mailshot_id WHERE T2.outcome_code  =  'Order' GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(DISTINCT T2.mailshot_id)  >=  2

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: Show the names of customers who have the most mailshots.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN mailshot_customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: What are the name and payment method of customers who have both mailshots in 'Order' outcome and mailshots in 'No Response' outcome.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT T1.customer_name, T1.payment_method FROM customers AS T1 JOIN mailshot_customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN mailshot_campaigns AS T3 ON T2.mailshot_id = T3.mailshot_id WHERE T3.outcome_code = 'Order' INTERSECT SELECT T1.customer_name, T1.payment_method FROM customers AS T1 JOIN mailshot_customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN mailshot_campaigns AS T3 ON T2.mailshot_id = T3.mailshot_id WHERE T3.outcome_code =

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: Show the premise type and address type code for all customer addresses.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT T1.premises_type ,  T2.address_type_code FROM premises AS T1 JOIN customer_addresses AS T2 ON T1.premise_id  =  T2.premise_id

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: What are the distinct address type codes for all customer addresses?
Show the shipping charge and customer id for customer orders with order status Cancelled or Paid.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT customer_id, order_shipping_charges FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status_code IN ('Cancelled', 'Paid')

customers_campaigns_ecommerce.question: Show the names of customers having an order with shipping method FedEx and order status Paid.
customers_campaigns_ecommerce.query: SELECT customer_name FROM customers AS c JOIN customer_orders AS o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.shipping_method_code = 'FedEx' AND o.order_status_code = 'Paid'

college_3.question: What are the full names of the 3 instructors who teach the most courses?
college_3.query: SELECT CONCAT(fname, ' ', lname) AS full_name FROM Faculty JOIN Course ON Faculty.facid = Course.instructor GROUP BY Faculty.facid ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3

college_3.question: Which building does the instructor who teaches the most number of courses live in?
college_3.query: SELECT T1.building FROM Faculty AS T1 JOIN Course AS T2 ON T1.FacID = T2.Instructor GROUP BY T1.building ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

college_3.question: Give the building that the instructor who teaches the greatest number of courses lives in.

college_3.question: Find the student first and last names and grade points of all enrollments.
college_3.query: SELECT T1.Fname, T1.LName, T2.gradepoint FROM Student AS T1 JOIN Enrolled_in AS T2 ON T1.StuID = T2.StuID JOIN Gradeconversion AS T3 ON T2.Grade = T3.lettergrade

college_3.question: What are the full names and gradepoints for all enrollments?
college_3.query: SELECT CONCAT(T1.Fname, ' ', T1.LName) AS full_name, T2.GradePoint FROM Student AS T1 JOIN Enrolled_in AS T2 ON T1.StuID = T2.StuID JOIN Gradeconversion AS T3 ON T2.Grade = T3.lettergrade

college_3.question: Find the distinct student first names of all students that have grade point at least 3.8 in one course.
college_3.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.fname FROM Student AS T1 JOIN Enrolled_in AS T2 ON T1.StuID = T2.StuID JOIN Gradeconversion AS T3 ON T2.Grade = T3.lettergrade WHERE T3.gradepoint >= 3.8

college_3.question: What are the distinct first names for students with a grade point of 3.8 or above in at least one course?
college_3.query: SELECT DISTINCT Fname FROM Student AS S JOIN Enrolled_in AS E ON S.StuID = E.StuID JOIN Gradeconversion AS G ON E.Grade = G.lettergrade WHERE G.gradepoint >= 3.8

college_3.question: What are the full names of students minoring in department 140?
college_3.query: SELECT Fname ,  LName FROM Student JOIN Minor_in ON Student.StuID  =  Minor_in.StuID WHERE Minor_in.DNO  =  140

college_3.question: Find the last names of faculties who are members of computer science department.

college_3.question: What are the last names of faculty who are part of the computer science department?
college_3.query: SELECT Lname FROM Faculty AS T1 JOIN Member_of AS T2 ON T1.FacID  =  T2.FacID JOIN Department AS T3 ON T2.DNO  =  T3.DNO WHERE T3.DName  =  'Computer Science'

college_3.question: Find the average grade point of student whose last name is Smith.

college_3.question: What is the average gradepoint for students with the last name Smith?

college_3.question: What is the maximum and minimum grade point of students who live in NYC?

department_store.question: What are the ids of the top three products that were purchased in the largest amount?
department_store.query: SELECT t1.product_id FROM order_items AS t1 JOIN (SELECT product_id, sum(order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_items GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 3) AS t2 ON t1.product_id = t2.product_id GROUP BY t1.product_id ORDER BY sum(t1.order_quantity) DESC;

department_store.question: Give the ids of the three products purchased in the largest amounts.
department_store.query: SELECT t1.product_id FROM order_items AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.order_id = t2.order_id WHERE t2.order_status_code = "purchased" GROUP BY t1.product_id ORDER BY sum(t1.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 3;

department_store.question: What are the product id and product type of the cheapest product?

department_store.question: Give the id and product type of the product with the lowest price.
department_store.query: SELECT product_id, product_type_code FROM Products WHERE product_price = (SELECT MIN(product_price) FROM Products);

department_store.question: Find the number of different product types.
department_store.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT product_type_code) FROM Products;

department_store.question: What are the staff ids and genders of all staffs whose job title is Department Manager?

department_store.question: How many department stores does the store chain South have?

department_store.question: Count the number of stores the chain South has.

department_store.question: What is the name and job title of the staff who was assigned the latest?
department_store.query: SELECT t2.staff_name, t1.job_title_code FROM staff_department_assignments AS t1 JOIN staff AS t2 ON t1.staff_id = t2.staff_id ORDER BY t1.date_assigned_from DESC LIMIT 1

department_store.question: Return the name and job title of the staff with the latest date assigned.
department_store.query: SELECT staff_name, job_title_code FROM Staff_Department_Assignments AS T1 JOIN Staff AS T2 ON T1.staff_id = T2.staff_id ORDER BY T1.date_assigned_from DESC LIMIT 1;

department_store.question: Give me the product type, name and price for all the products supplied by supplier id 3.
department_store.query: SELECT product_type_code, product_name, product_price FROM Products JOIN Product_Suppliers ON Products.product_id = Product_Suppliers.product_id WHERE Product_Suppliers.supplier_id = 3;

department_store.question: Return the product type, name, and price for products supplied by supplier 3.
department_store.query: SELECT product_type_code, product_name, product_price FROM Products AS T1 JOIN Product_Suppliers AS T2 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id WHERE T2.supplier_id = 3;

department_store.question: Return the distinct name of customers whose order status is Pending, in the order of customer id.
department_store.query: SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM Customers JOIN Customer_Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Customer_Orders.customer_id WHERE order_status_code = 'Pending' ORDER BY Customers.customer_id;

department_store.question: What are the distinct names of customers with an order status of Pending, sorted by customer id?
department_store.query: SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM Customers JOIN Customer_Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Customer_Orders.customer_id WHERE order_status_code = 'Pending' ORDER BY Customers.customer_id;

department_store.question: What are the names and addressed of customers who have both New and Pending orders?
department_store.query: SELECT c.customer_name, a.address_details FROM Customers c JOIN Customer_Addresses ca ON c.customer_id = ca.customer_id JOIN Addresses a ON ca.address_id = a.address_id WHERE c.customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customer_Orders WHERE order_status_code = 'New') AND c.customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customer_Orders WHERE order_status_code = 'Pending')

department_store.question: Return ids of all the products that are supplied by supplier id 2 and are more expensive than the average price of all products.
department_store.query: SELECT product_id FROM Products WHERE product_price > (SELECT AVG(product_price) FROM Products) AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM Product_Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2);

department_store.question: What are the ids of products from the supplier with id 2, which are more expensive than the average price across all products?
department_store.query: SELECT product_id FROM Products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM Product_Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2) AND product_price > (SELECT AVG(product_price) FROM Products);

department_store.question: What is the id and name of the department store that has both marketing and managing department?
department_store.query: SELECT T1.dept_store_id, T1.store_name FROM Department_Stores AS T1 JOIN Departments AS T2 ON T1.dept_store_id = T2.dept_store_id WHERE T2.department_name IN ('marketing', 'managing') GROUP BY T1.dept_store_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T2.department_name) = 2;

department_store.question: What are the ids and names of department stores with both marketing and managing departments?
department_store.query: SELECT T1.dept_store_id, T1.store_name FROM Department_Stores AS T1 JOIN Departments AS T2 ON T1.dept_store_id = T2.dept_store_id WHERE T2.department_name = "Marketing" AND T1.dept_store_id IN (SELECT T1.dept_store_id FROM Department_Stores AS T1 JOIN Departments AS T2 ON T1.dept_store_id = T2.dept_store_id WHERE T2.department_name = "Managing")

department_store.question: What are the ids of the two department store chains with the largest number of department stores?
department_store.query: SELECT T1.dept_store_chain_id FROM Department_Stores AS T1 JOIN Department_Store_Chain AS T2 ON T1.dept_store_chain_id = T2.dept_store_chain_id GROUP BY T1.dept_store_chain_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 2;

department_store.question: Return the ids of the two department store chains with the most department stores.
department_store.query: SELECT T1.dept_store_chain_id FROM department_stores AS T1 JOIN department_store_chain AS T2 ON T1.dept_store_chain_id = T2.dept_store_chain_id GROUP BY T1.dept_store_chain_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 2;

department_store.question: What is the id of the department with the least number of staff?

department_store.question: Return the id of the department with the fewest staff assignments.
department_store.query: SELECT T2.department_id FROM Staff_Department_Assignments AS T1 JOIN Departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id = T2.department_id GROUP BY T1.department_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) LIMIT 1;

department_store.question: Find the product type whose average price is higher than the average price of all products.
department_store.query: SELECT product_type_code FROM products GROUP BY product_type_code HAVING avg(product_price) > (SELECT avg(product_price) FROM products)

department_store.question: What is the code of the product type with an average price higher than the average price of all products?

department_store.question: What are the names and ids of products costing between 600 and 700?

department_store.question: Find the ids of all distinct customers who made order after some orders that were Cancelled.
department_store.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.customer_id FROM customer_orders AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id = t2.customer_id WHERE t1.order_date > t2.order_date AND t2.order_status_code = 'Cancelled'

department_store.question: What are the distinct ids of customers who made an order after any order that was Cancelled?
department_store.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.customer_id FROM customer_orders AS t1 JOIN customer_orders AS t2 ON t1.customer_id = t2.customer_id WHERE t1.order_date > t2.order_date AND t2.order_status_code = "Cancelled";

department_store.question: What is id of the staff who had a Staff Department Assignment earlier than any Clerical Staff?
department_store.query: SELECT staff_id FROM Staff_Department_Assignments WHERE job_title_code != 'Clerical' AND date_assigned_from < (SELECT MIN(date_assigned_from) FROM Staff_Department_Assignments WHERE job_title_code = 'Clerical') ORDER BY date_assigned_from ASC LIMIT 1;

department_store.question: Return the id of the staff whose Staff Department Assignment was earlier than that of any Clerical Staff.
department_store.query: SELECT T1.staff_id FROM Staff_Department_Assignments AS T1 JOIN Departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id = T2.department_id WHERE T1.job_title_code != "Clerical Staff" AND T1.date_assigned_from < (SELECT MIN(date_assigned_from) FROM Staff_Department_Assignments WHERE job_title_code = "Clerical Staff") ORDER BY T1.date_assigned_from ASC LIMIT 1;

department_store.question: What are the names and ids of customers whose address contains TN?
department_store.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers JOIN Customer_Addresses ON Customers.customer_id = Customer_Addresses.customer_id JOIN Addresses ON Customer_Addresses.address_id = Addresses.address_id WHERE address_details LIKE '%TN%'

department_store.question: Return the names and ids of customers who have TN in their address.

department_store.question: Return the name and gender of the staff who was assigned in 2016.
department_store.query: SELECT staff_name, staff_gender FROM Staff AS T1 JOIN Staff_Department_Assignments AS T2 ON T1.staff_id = T2.staff_id WHERE T2.date_assigned_from LIKE '2016%';

department_store.question: What are the names and genders of staff who were assigned in 2016?
department_store.query: SELECT staff_name, staff_gender FROM Staff JOIN Staff_Department_Assignments ON Staff.staff_id = Staff_Department_Assignments.staff_id WHERE date_assigned_from >= '2016-01-01' AND date_assigned_from <= '2016-12-31'

department_store.question: List the name of staff who has been assigned multiple jobs.

department_store.question: What are the names of staff who have been assigned multiple jobs?

department_store.question: List the name and phone number of all suppliers in the alphabetical order of their addresses.
department_store.query: SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM suppliers JOIN supplier_addresses ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_addresses.supplier_id JOIN addresses ON supplier_addresses.address_id = addresses.address_id ORDER BY addresses.address_details ASC

department_store.question: What are the names and phone numbers for all suppliers, sorted in alphabetical order of their addressed?
department_store.query: SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM Suppliers JOIN Supplier_Addresses ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Supplier_Addresses.supplier_id JOIN Addresses ON Supplier_Addresses.address_id = Addresses.address_id ORDER BY Addresses.address_details ASC

department_store.question: What are the phone numbers of all customers and suppliers.
department_store.query: SELECT customer_phone FROM Customers UNION SELECT supplier_phone FROM Suppliers;

department_store.question: Return the phone numbers for all customers and suppliers.
department_store.query: SELECT customer_phone AS phone_number FROM Customers UNION SELECT supplier_phone AS phone_number FROM Suppliers;

department_store.question: Return the ids of all products that were ordered more than three times or supplied more than 80000.
department_store.query: SELECT T1.product_id FROM Order_Items AS T1 JOIN (SELECT product_id, SUM(total_amount_purchased) AS total_purchased FROM Product_Suppliers GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_purchased > 80000) AS T2 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id GROUP BY T1.product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

department_store.question: What are the ids of all products that were either ordered more than 3 times or have a cumulative amount purchased of above 80000?
department_store.query: SELECT product_id FROM (SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING order_count > 3 UNION SELECT product_id FROM Product_Suppliers GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(total_value_purchased) > 80000) AS T;

department_store.question: What are id and name of the products whose price is lower than 600 or higher than 900?
department_store.query: SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE product_price < 600 OR product_price > 900;

department_store.question: Give the ids and names of products with price lower than 600 or higher than 900.

department_store.question: Find the id of suppliers whose average amount purchased for each product is above 50000 or below 30000.
department_store.query: SELECT supplier_id FROM product_suppliers GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING AVG(total_value_purchased/total_amount_purchased) > 50000 OR AVG(total_value_purchased/total_amount_purchased) < 30000;

department_store.question: What are the ids of suppliers which have an average amount purchased of above 50000 or below 30000?
department_store.query: SELECT supplier_id FROM product_suppliers GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING avg(total_value_purchased) > 50000 OR avg(total_value_purchased) < 30000;

department_store.question: What are the average amount purchased and value purchased for the supplier who supplies the most products.
department_store.query: SELECT avg(total_amount_purchased), avg(total_value_purchased) FROM product_suppliers WHERE supplier_id = (SELECT supplier_id FROM product_suppliers GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1);

department_store.question: Return the average total amount purchased and total value purchased for the supplier who supplies the greatest number of products.
department_store.query: SELECT AVG(total_amount_purchased), AVG(total_value_purchased) FROM product_suppliers WHERE supplier_id = (SELECT supplier_id FROM product_suppliers GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1);

department_store.question: What is the largest and smallest customer codes?

department_store.question: Return the maximum and minimum customer codes.
department_store.query: SELECT MAX(customer_code), MIN(customer_code) FROM Customers

department_store.question: List the names of all the distinct customers who bought a keyboard.
department_store.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name FROM Customers c JOIN Customer_Orders co ON c.customer_id = co.customer_id JOIN Order_Items oi ON co.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN Products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_name = 'keyboard'

department_store.question: What are the distinct names of customers who have purchased a keyboard?
department_store.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name FROM Customers AS c JOIN Customer_Orders AS co ON c.customer_id = co.customer_id JOIN Order_Items AS oi ON co.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN Products AS p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_name = 'keyboard'

department_store.question: List the names and phone numbers of all the distinct suppliers who supply red jeans.
department_store.query: SELECT DISTINCT s.supplier_name, s.supplier_phone FROM suppliers AS s JOIN product_suppliers AS ps ON s.supplier_id = ps.supplier_id JOIN products AS p ON ps.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_name = "red jeans";

department_store.question: What are the distinct names and phone numbers for suppliers who have red jeans?
department_store.query: SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM Suppliers AS T1 JOIN Supplier_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.supplier_id = T2.supplier_id JOIN Addresses AS T3 ON T2.address_id = T3.address_id JOIN Product_Suppliers AS T4 ON T1.supplier_id = T4.supplier_id JOIN Products AS T5 ON T4.product_id = T5.product_id WHERE T5.product_name = "red jeans";

department_store.question: What are the highest and lowest prices of products, grouped by and alphabetically ordered by product type?
department_store.query: SELECT product_type_code, MAX(product_price) AS highest_price, MIN(product_price) AS lowest_price FROM Products GROUP BY product_type_code ORDER BY product_type_code ASC;

department_store.question: Give the maximum and minimum product prices for each product type, grouped and ordered by product type.
department_store.query: SELECT product_type_code, MAX(product_price) AS max_price, MIN(product_price) AS min_price FROM Products GROUP BY product_type_code ORDER BY product_type_code;

department_store.question: List the order id, customer id for orders in Cancelled status, ordered by their order dates.
department_store.query: SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM Customer_Orders WHERE order_status_code = 'Cancelled' ORDER BY order_date;

department_store.question: What are the order ids and customer ids for orders that have been Cancelled, sorted by their order dates?
department_store.query: SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM Customer_Orders WHERE order_status_code = 'Cancelled' ORDER BY order_date;

department_store.question: Find the names of products that were bought by at least two distinct customers.
department_store.query: SELECT T3.product_name FROM Customer_Orders AS T1 JOIN Order_Items AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id JOIN Products AS T3 ON T2.product_id = T3.product_id GROUP BY T3.product_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1.customer_id) >= 2;

department_store.question: What are the distinct names of products purchased by at least two different customers?
department_store.query: SELECT DISTINCT p.product_name FROM products p JOIN order_items oi ON p.product_id = oi.product_id JOIN customer_orders co ON oi.order_id = co.order_id GROUP BY p.product_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT co.customer_id) >= 2

department_store.question: Find the names of customers who have bought by at least three distinct products.
department_store.query: SELECT c.customer_name FROM Customers c JOIN Customer_Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN Order_Items i ON o.order_id = i.order_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT i.product_id) >= 3;

department_store.question: What are the distinct names of customers who have purchased at least three different products?
department_store.query: SELECT c.customer_name FROM customers AS c JOIN customer_orders AS o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items AS i ON o.order_id = i.order_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT i.product_id) >= 3

department_store.question: Find the name and gender of the staff who has been assigned the job of Sales Person but never Clerical Staff.
department_store.query: SELECT staff_name, staff_gender FROM Staff AS T1 JOIN Staff_Department_Assignments AS T2 ON T1.staff_id = T2.staff_id JOIN Departments AS T3 ON T2.department_id = T3.department_id WHERE T2.job_title_code = 'Sales Person' AND T1.staff_id NOT IN (SELECT staff_id FROM Staff_Department_Assignments WHERE job_title_code = 'Clerical Staff')

department_store.question: What are the names and genders of staff who have held the title Sales Person, but never Clerical Staff?
department_store.query: SELECT staff_name, staff_gender FROM Staff WHERE staff_id IN (SELECT staff_id FROM Staff_Department_Assignments WHERE job_title_code = 'Sales Person') AND staff_id NOT IN (SELECT staff_id FROM Staff_Department_Assignments WHERE job_title_code = 'Clerical Staff')

department_store.question: Find the id and name of customers whose address contains WY state and do not use credit card for payment.
department_store.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN Customer_Addresses AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN Addresses AS T3 ON T2.address_id = T3.address_id WHERE T3.state_province_county = 'WY' AND T1.payment_method_code != 'credit card'

department_store.question: What are the ids and names of customers with addressed that contain WY and who do not use a credit card for payment?

aircraft.query: SELECT DISTINCT aircraft.Aircraft, aircraft.Description FROM aircraft JOIN airport_aircraft ON aircraft.Aircraft_ID = airport_aircraft.Aircraft_ID JOIN airport ON airport_aircraft.Airport_ID = airport.Airport_ID WHERE airport.Total_Passengers > 10000000;

aircraft.question: What is the average total number of passengers of airports that are associated with aircraft "Robinson R-22"?
aircraft.query: SELECT AVG(airport.Total_Passengers) FROM airport JOIN airport_aircraft ON airport.Airport_ID = airport_aircraft.Airport_ID JOIN aircraft ON airport_aircraft.Aircraft_ID = aircraft.Aircraft_ID WHERE aircraft.Aircraft = 'Robinson R-22'

aircraft.question: What is the average total number of passengers for all airports that the aircraft "Robinson R-22" visits?
aircraft.query: SELECT avg(airport.Total_Passengers) FROM airport JOIN airport_aircraft ON airport.Airport_ID = airport_aircraft.Airport_ID JOIN aircraft ON airport_aircraft.Aircraft_ID = aircraft.Aircraft_ID WHERE aircraft.Aircraft = "Robinson R-22";

aircraft.question: Please list the location and the winning aircraft name.
aircraft.query: SELECT match.Location, aircraft.Aircraft FROM match JOIN aircraft ON match.Winning_Aircraft = aircraft.Aircraft_ID;

aircraft.question: What is the location and name of the winning aircraft?
aircraft.query: SELECT match.Location, aircraft.Aircraft FROM match JOIN aircraft ON match.Winning_Aircraft = aircraft.Aircraft_ID;

aircraft.question: List the name of the aircraft that has been named winning aircraft the most number of times.
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.Aircraft, count(*) FROM match JOIN aircraft ON match.Winning_Aircraft = aircraft.Aircraft_ID GROUP BY match.Winning_Aircraft ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1;

aircraft.question: What is the name of the aircraft that has won an award the most?
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.aircraft FROM aircraft JOIN match ON aircraft.Aircraft_ID = match.Winning_Aircraft GROUP BY match.Winning_Aircraft ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1;

aircraft.question: List the names of aircrafts and the number of times it won matches.
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.aircraft ,  count(*) FROM match JOIN aircraft ON match.winning_aircraft = aircraft.aircraft_id GROUP BY aircraft.aircraft;

aircraft.question: For each aircraft that has won an award, what is its name and how many time has it won?
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.Aircraft, COUNT(*) FROM match JOIN aircraft ON match.Winning_Aircraft = aircraft.Aircraft_ID GROUP BY match.Winning_Aircraft;

aircraft.question: List names of all pilot in descending order of age.
aircraft.query: SELECT Name FROM pilot ORDER BY Age DESC

aircraft.question: What are the names of all pilots listed by descending age?
aircraft.query: SELECT Name FROM pilot ORDER BY Age DESC

aircraft.question: List the names of aircrafts and that won matches at least twice.
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.aircraft FROM aircraft JOIN match ON aircraft.aircraft_id = match.winning_aircraft GROUP BY aircraft.aircraft HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;

aircraft.question: What are the names of all aircrafts that have won a match at least twice?
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.Aircraft FROM aircraft JOIN match ON aircraft.Aircraft_ID = match.Winning_Aircraft GROUP BY aircraft.Aircraft HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;

aircraft.question: List the names of aircrafts and that did not win any match.
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.Aircraft FROM aircraft WHERE aircraft.Aircraft_ID NOT IN (SELECT Winning_Aircraft FROM match);

aircraft.question: What are the names of all aicrafts that have never won any match?
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.Aircraft FROM aircraft WHERE aircraft.Aircraft_ID NOT IN (SELECT Winning_Aircraft FROM match)

aircraft.question: Show the names of aircrafts that are associated with both an airport named "London Heathrow" and an airport named "London Gatwick"
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.Aircraft FROM aircraft JOIN airport_aircraft ON aircraft.Aircraft_ID = airport_aircraft.Aircraft_ID JOIN airport ON airport_aircraft.Airport_ID = airport.Airport_ID WHERE airport.Airport_Name = 'London Heathrow' AND aircraft.Aircraft IN (SELECT aircraft.Aircraft FROM aircraft JOIN airport_aircraft ON aircraft.Aircraft_ID = airport_aircraft.Aircraft_ID JOIN airport ON airport_aircraft.Airport_ID = airport.Airport_ID WHERE airport.Airport_Name = 'London Gatwick')

aircraft.question: What are the names of all aircrafts that are associated with both London Heathrow and Gatwick airports?
aircraft.query: SELECT aircraft.aircraft FROM aircraft JOIN airport_aircraft ON aircraft.Aircraft_ID = airport_aircraft.Aircraft_ID JOIN airport ON airport_aircraft.Airport_ID = airport.Airport_ID WHERE airport.Airport_Name = 'London Heathrow' AND aircraft.Aircraft_ID IN (SELECT aircraft_id FROM airport_aircraft JOIN airport ON airport_aircraft.Airport_ID = airport.Airport_ID WHERE airport.Airport_Name = 'Gatwick');

aircraft.question: Show all information on the airport that has the largest number of international passengers.
aircraft.query: SELECT * FROM airport ORDER BY International_Passengers DESC LIMIT 1;

aircraft.question: What is all the information on the airport with the largest number of international passengers?
aircraft.query: SELECT * FROM airport WHERE International_Passengers = (SELECT MAX(International_Passengers) FROM airport)

aircraft.question: find the name and age of the pilot who has won the most number of times among the pilots who are younger than 30.
aircraft.query: SELECT pilot.Name, pilot.Age FROM pilot JOIN match ON pilot.Pilot_Id = match.Winning_Pilot WHERE pilot.Age < 30 GROUP BY pilot.Pilot_Id HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT MAX(count) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM match WHERE Winning_Pilot IN (SELECT Pilot_Id FROM pilot WHERE Age < 30) GROUP BY Winning_Pilot) AS T) LIMIT 1;

aircraft.question: What is the name and age of the pilot younger than 30 who has won the most number of times?
aircraft.query: SELECT pilot.name, pilot.age FROM pilot JOIN match ON pilot.pilot_id = match.winning_pilot WHERE pilot.age < 30 GROUP BY pilot.pilot_id ORDER BY COUNT(match.round) DESC LIMIT 1;

aircraft.question: what is the name and age of the youngest winning pilot?
aircraft.query: SELECT Name, Age FROM pilot WHERE Pilot_Id = (SELECT Winning_Pilot FROM match ORDER BY Fastest_Qualifying ASC LIMIT 1)

aircraft.question: How old is the youngest winning pilot and what is their name?
aircraft.query: SELECT Name, Age FROM pilot WHERE Pilot_Id = (SELECT Winning_Pilot FROM match ORDER BY Fastest_Qualifying LIMIT 1)

aircraft.question: find the name of pilots who did not win the matches held in the country of Australia.
aircraft.query: SELECT Name FROM pilot WHERE Pilot_Id NOT IN (SELECT Winning_Pilot FROM match WHERE Country = 'Australia')

aircraft.question: What are the names of the pilots that have not won any matches in Australia?
aircraft.query: SELECT Name FROM pilot WHERE Pilot_Id NOT IN (SELECT Winning_Pilot FROM match WHERE Country = 'Australia')

local_govt_and_lot.question: How many residents does each property have? List property id and resident count.
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT property_id, count(*) AS resident_count FROM Residents GROUP BY property_id;

local_govt_and_lot.question: What is the distinct service types that are provided by the organization which has detail 'Denesik and Sons Party'?
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT DISTINCT service_type_code FROM services AS t1 JOIN organizations AS t2 ON t1.organization_id = t2.organization_id WHERE t2.organization_details = 'Denesik and Sons Party'

local_govt_and_lot.question: How many services has each resident requested? List the resident id, details, and the count in descending order of the count.
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT t1.resident_id, t2.resident_details, count(*) FROM residents_services AS t1 JOIN residents AS t2 ON t1.resident_id = t2.resident_id GROUP BY t1.resident_id, t2.resident_details ORDER BY count(*) DESC

local_govt_and_lot.question: What is the maximum number that a certain service is provided? List the service id, details and number.
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT service_id, service_details, COUNT(*) AS num_provided FROM Residents_Services GROUP BY service_id ORDER BY num_provided DESC LIMIT 1;

local_govt_and_lot.question: List the id and type of each thing, and the details of the organization that owns it.
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT T1.thing_id, T1.type_of_thing_code, T2.organization_details FROM things AS T1 JOIN organizations AS T2 ON T1.organization_id = T2.organization_id;

local_govt_and_lot.question: What are the id and details of the customers who have at least 3 events?
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT T1.customer_id, T1.customer_details FROM Customers AS T1 JOIN Customer_Events AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*) >= 3;

local_govt_and_lot.question: What is each customer's move in date, and the corresponding customer id and details?
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_details, date_moved_in FROM Customers JOIN Residents ON Customers.customer_id = Residents.resident_id;

local_govt_and_lot.question: Which events have the number of notes between one and three? List the event id and the property id.
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT t1.Customer_Event_ID, t1.property_id FROM Customer_Events AS t1 JOIN (SELECT Customer_Event_ID, COUNT(*) AS note_count FROM Customer_Event_Notes GROUP BY Customer_Event_ID) AS t2 ON t1.Customer_Event_ID = t2.Customer_Event_ID WHERE t2.note_count BETWEEN 1 AND 3;

local_govt_and_lot.question: What are the distinct id and type of the thing that has the status 'Close' or has a status record before the date '2017-06-19 02:59:21'
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.thing_id, T1.type_of_thing_code FROM Things AS T1 JOIN Timed_Status_of_Things AS T2 ON T1.thing_id = T2.thing_id WHERE T2.status_of_thing_code = 'Close' OR T2.date_and_date < '2017-06-19 02:59:21'

local_govt_and_lot.question: How many distinct locations have the things with service detail 'Unsatisfied' been located in?
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT t2.location_code) FROM things AS t1 JOIN timed_locations_of_things AS t2 ON t1.thing_id = t2.thing_id WHERE t1.service_details = 'Unsatisfied'

local_govt_and_lot.question: How many different status codes of things are there?
Which organizations are not a parent organization of others? List the organization id.
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT organization_id FROM Organizations WHERE organization_id NOT IN (SELECT parent_organization_id FROM Organizations WHERE parent_organization_id IS NOT NULL)

local_govt_and_lot.question: When is the last day any resident moved in?
What are the resident details containing the substring 'Miss'?
local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT * FROM Residents WHERE other_details LIKE "%Miss%"

local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT customer_event_id, date_moved_in, property_id FROM customer_events

local_govt_and_lot.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customer_Events);

soccer_2.query: This question cannot be answered with the given database schema as there is no information on the number of hours players train.

soccer_2.question: What are the names of players who train between 500 and 1500 hours?
soccer_2.query: SELECT pname FROM player WHERE ycard BETWEEN 500 AND 1500

soccer_2.question: Find the players whose names contain letter 'a'.
soccer_2.query: SELECT * FROM Player WHERE pName LIKE '%a%'

soccer_2.question: Who are the players that have names containing the letter a?
soccer_2.query: SELECT pname FROM player WHERE pname LIKE '%a%'

soccer_2.question: Find the name, enrollment of the colleges whose size is bigger than 10000 and location is in state LA.
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName, enr FROM College WHERE enr > 10000 AND state = 'LA'

soccer_2.question: What are the names and enrollment numbers for colleges that have more than 10000 enrolled and are located in Louisiana?
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName, enr FROM College WHERE state = 'Louisiana' AND enr > 10000

soccer_2.question: List all information about college sorted by enrollment number in the ascending order.
soccer_2.query: SELECT * FROM College ORDER BY enr ASC

soccer_2.question: What information do you have on colleges sorted by increasing enrollment numbers?
soccer_2.query: SELECT * FROM College ORDER BY enr ASC

soccer_2.question: List the name of the colleges whose enrollment is greater 18000 sorted by the college's name.
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr > 18000 ORDER BY cName ASC

soccer_2.question: What is the name of every college in alphabetical order that has more than 18000 students enrolled?
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr > 18000 ORDER BY cName ASC

soccer_2.question: Find the name of players whose card is yes in the descending order of training hours.
soccer_2.query: SELECT pname FROM player ORDER BY ycard DESC, (SELECT sum(hours) FROM tryout WHERE tryout.pid = player.pid) DESC

soccer_2.question: What are the name of the players who received a card in descending order of the hours of training?
soccer_2.query: SELECT pname FROM player ORDER BY ycard DESC

soccer_2.question: Find the name of different colleges involved in the tryout in alphabetical order.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT cName FROM Tryout ORDER BY cName ASC

soccer_2.question: What are the different names of the colleges involved in the tryout in alphabetical order?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT cName FROM tryout ORDER BY cName ASC

soccer_2.question: Which position is most popular among players in the tryout?
soccer_2.query: SELECT pPos FROM Tryout GROUP BY pPos ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

soccer_2.question: What was the most popular position at tryouts?
soccer_2.query: SELECT pPos, COUNT(*) AS num_players FROM Tryout GROUP BY pPos ORDER BY num_players DESC LIMIT 1

soccer_2.question: Find the number of students who participate in the tryout for each college ordered by descending count.
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName, count(*) FROM Tryout GROUP BY cName ORDER BY count(*) DESC

soccer_2.question: How many students participated in tryouts for each college by descennding count?
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName, count(*) AS num_tryouts FROM Tryout GROUP BY cName ORDER BY num_tryouts DESC

soccer_2.question: For each position, what is the minimum time students spent practicing?
soccer_2.query: SELECT ppos, min(ycard) FROM tryout GROUP BY ppos

soccer_2.question: What are the names of schools with the top 3 largest size?
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College ORDER BY enr DESC LIMIT 3

soccer_2.question: What are the names of the schools with the top 3 largest class sizes?
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College ORDER BY enr DESC LIMIT 3

soccer_2.question: What is the name of school that has the smallest enrollment in each state?
soccer_2.query: SELECT state, MIN(enr), cName FROM College GROUP BY state

soccer_2.question: What is the name of the school with smallest enrollment size per state?
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr = (SELECT MIN(enr) FROM College AS c2 WHERE c2.state = College.state) GROUP BY state ORDER BY enr ASC LIMIT 1

soccer_2.question: Find the states where have some college students in tryout.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT state FROM college WHERE cName IN (SELECT cName FROM tryout)

soccer_2.question: What are the different states that have students trying out?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT state FROM college JOIN tryout ON college.cname = tryout.cname

soccer_2.question: Find the states where have some college students in tryout and their decisions are yes.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT state FROM college WHERE cName IN (SELECT cName FROM tryout WHERE decision = 'yes')

soccer_2.question: What are the different states that had students successfully try out?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT state FROM college WHERE cName IN (SELECT cName FROM tryout WHERE decision = 'Accepted')

soccer_2.question: Find the name and college of students whose decisions are yes in the tryout.
soccer_2.query: SELECT t2.pName, t3.cName FROM Tryout AS t1 JOIN Player AS t2 ON t1.pID = t2.pID JOIN College AS t3 ON t1.cName = t3.cName WHERE t1.decision = "yes"

soccer_2.question: What are the names of all the players who received a yes during tryouts, and also what are the names of their colleges?
soccer_2.query: SELECT t2.pName, t1.cName FROM College AS t1 JOIN Tryout AS t3 ON t1.cName = t3.cName JOIN Player AS t2 ON t3.pID = t2.pID WHERE t3.decision = "yes"

soccer_2.question: Find the name of all students who were in the tryout sorted in alphabetic order.
soccer_2.query: SELECT pName FROM Player JOIN Tryout ON Player.pID = Tryout.pID ORDER BY pName ASC

soccer_2.question: What are the names of all students who tried out in alphabetical order?
soccer_2.query: SELECT pName FROM Player JOIN Tryout ON Player.pID = Tryout.pID ORDER BY pName ASC

soccer_2.question: Find the name and hours of the students whose tryout decision is yes.
soccer_2.query: SELECT pName, enr FROM Player AS T1 JOIN Tryout AS T2 ON T1.pID = T2.pID WHERE T2.decision = "yes"

soccer_2.question: What are the names and hours spent practicing of every student who received a yes at tryouts?
soccer_2.query: SELECT pName, sum(hours_practiced) FROM Player JOIN Tryout ON Player.pID = Tryout.pID WHERE decision = 'yes' GROUP BY Player.pID

soccer_2.question: Find the states of the colleges that have students in the tryout who played in striker position.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.state FROM college AS c JOIN tryout AS t ON c.cname = t.cname WHERE t.ppos = 'striker'

soccer_2.question: What are the states of the colleges where students who tried out for the striker position attend?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.state FROM college AS c JOIN tryout AS t ON c.cname = t.cname WHERE t.ppos = 'striker'

soccer_2.question: Find the names of the students who are in the position of striker and got a yes tryout decision.
soccer_2.query: SELECT pName FROM Player JOIN Tryout ON Player.pID = Tryout.pID WHERE pPos = 'striker' AND decision = 'yes'

soccer_2.question: What are the names of all students who successfully tried out for the position of striker?
soccer_2.query: SELECT pName FROM Player WHERE pID IN (SELECT pID FROM Tryout WHERE pPos = 'striker' AND decision = 'accepted')

soccer_2.question: Find the state of the college which player Charles is attending.
soccer_2.query: SELECT state FROM college WHERE cName IN (SELECT cName FROM tryout WHERE pID IN (SELECT pID FROM player WHERE pName = 'Charles'))

soccer_2.question: In which state is the college that Charles attends?
soccer_2.query: SELECT state FROM college AS T1 JOIN player AS T2 ON T1.cName  =  T2.HS WHERE T2.pName  =  "Charles"

soccer_2.question: Find the average and maximum hours for the students whose tryout decision is yes.
soccer_2.query: SELECT avg(t2.ycard), max(t2.ycard) FROM tryout AS t1 JOIN player AS t2 ON t1.pid  =  t2.pid WHERE t1.decision  =  "yes"

soccer_2.question: What is the average and maximum number of hours students who made the team practiced?
soccer_2.query: SELECT avg(t1.hours_practiced), max(t1.hours_practiced) FROM (SELECT sum(hours_practiced) AS hours_practiced FROM tryout WHERE decision = 'Accepted' GROUP BY pid) AS t1

soccer_2.question: Find the average hours for the students whose tryout decision is no.
soccer_2.query: This question cannot be answered with the given database schema as there is no information about hours for students or tryouts.

soccer_2.question: What is the maximum training hours for the students whose training hours is greater than 1000 in different positions?
soccer_2.query: SELECT pPos, MAX(enr) FROM College AS T1 JOIN Tryout AS T2 ON T1.cName = T2.cName JOIN Player AS T3 ON T2.pID = T3.pID WHERE T3.yCard > 1000 GROUP BY pPos

soccer_2.question: For each position, what is the maximum number of  hours for students who spent more than 1000 hours training?
soccer_2.query: SELECT t3.pPos, MAX(t2.yCard) FROM player AS t2 JOIN tryout AS t1 ON t2.pID  =  t1.pID JOIN college AS t3 ON t1.cName  =  t3.cName WHERE t2.yCard  >  1000 GROUP BY t3.pPos

soccer_2.question: Which colleges do the tryout players whose name starts with letter D go to?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.cName FROM college AS t1 JOIN tryout AS t2 ON t1.cName  =  t2.cName JOIN player AS t3 ON t2.pID  =  t3.pID WHERE t3.pName LIKE 'D%'

soccer_2.question: Which colleges does each player with a name that starts with the letter D  who tried out go to?
soccer_2.query: SELECT t1.pName, t2.cName FROM Player AS t1 JOIN Tryout AS t2 ON t1.pID = t2.pID WHERE t1.pName LIKE 'D%'

soccer_2.question: Which college has any student who is a goalie and succeeded in the tryout.
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE cName IN (SELECT cName FROM Tryout WHERE pPos = 'goalie' AND decision = 'succeeded')

soccer_2.question: What college has a student who successfully made the team in the role of a goalie?
soccer_2.query: SELECT t1.cname FROM college AS t1 JOIN tryout AS t2 ON t1.cname  =  t2.cname WHERE t2.ppos  =  "goalie" AND t2.decision  =  "accepted"

soccer_2.question: Find the name of the tryout players who are from the college with largest size.
soccer_2.query: SELECT t1.pName FROM player AS t1 JOIN tryout AS t2 ON t1.pID  =  t2.pID JOIN (SELECT cName FROM college ORDER BY enr DESC LIMIT 1) AS t3 ON t2.cName  =  t3.cName

soccer_2.question: What are the names of all tryout participants who are from the largest college?
soccer_2.query: SELECT t2.pName FROM college AS t1 JOIN player AS t2 ON t1.cName  =  t2.HS JOIN tryout AS t3 ON t2.pID  =  t3.pID WHERE t1.enr  =  (SELECT MAX(enr) FROM college)

soccer_2.question: What is the state and enrollment of the colleges where have any students who got accepted in the tryout decision.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT state, enr FROM college WHERE cName IN (SELECT cName FROM tryout WHERE decision = 'Accepted')

soccer_2.question: How many students are enrolled in colleges that have student accepted during tryouts, and in which states are those colleges?
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT enr), state FROM college WHERE cname IN (SELECT cname FROM tryout WHERE decision = 'Accepted') GROUP BY state

soccer_2.question: Find the names of either colleges in LA with greater than 15000 size or in state AZ with less than 13000 enrollment.
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE (state  =  "LA" AND enr > 15000) OR (state  =  "AZ" AND enr < 13000)

soccer_2.question: What are the names of colleges in LA that have more than 15,000 students and of colleges in AZ with less than 13,000 students?
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE state  =  "LA" AND enr > 15000 UNION SELECT cName FROM College WHERE state  =  "AZ" AND enr < 13000

soccer_2.question: Find the names of schools that have some students playing in goalie and mid positions.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.cName FROM college AS t1 JOIN tryout AS t2 ON t1.cName  =  t2.cName WHERE t2.pPos  IN  ("goalie", "mid") GROUP BY t1.cName HAVING count(DISTINCT t2.pID) >= 2

soccer_2.question: What are the names of all schools that have students trying out for the position of goal and 'mid'-field.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.cname FROM college AS t1 JOIN tryout AS t2 ON t1.cname  =  t2.cname WHERE t2.ppos  =  "goal" OR t2.ppos  =  "mid-field"

soccer_2.question: Find the names of states that have some college students playing in goalie and mid positions.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.state FROM college AS c JOIN tryout AS t ON c.cname = t.cname WHERE t.ppos IN ('goalie', 'mid')

soccer_2.question: What are the names of the states that have some college students playing in the positions of goalie and mid-field?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.state FROM College AS c JOIN Tryout AS t ON c.cName = t.cName WHERE t.pPos = "goalie" AND c.state IN (SELECT c2.state FROM College AS c2 JOIN Tryout AS t2 ON c2.cName = t2.cName WHERE t2.pPos = "mid-field")

soccer_2.question: How many schools have some students playing in goalie and mid positions.
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT t1.cname) FROM college AS t1 JOIN tryout AS t2 ON t1.cname  =  t2.cname WHERE t2.ppos  IN  ("goalie", "mid")

soccer_2.question: How many schools have students playing in goalie and mid-field positions?
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT cName) FROM Tryout WHERE pPos IN ("goalie", "mid-field")

soccer_2.question: Find the names of schools that have some players in the mid position but not in the goalie position.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.cName FROM college AS t1 JOIN tryout AS t2 ON t1.cName  =  t2.cName WHERE t2.pPos  =  "mid" AND t2.pID NOT IN (SELECT pID FROM tryout WHERE pPos  =  "goalie")

soccer_2.question: What are the names of the schools with some players in the mid position but no goalies?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.cName FROM college AS t1 JOIN tryout AS t2 ON t1.cName  =  t2.cName WHERE t2.pPos  =  "mid" AND t2.pID NOT IN (SELECT pID FROM tryout WHERE pPos  =  "goalie")

soccer_2.question: Find the names of states that have some college students playing in the mid position but not in the goalie position.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.state FROM college AS c JOIN tryout AS t ON c.cname = t.cname WHERE t.ppos = "mid" AND c.state NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT c.state FROM college AS c JOIN tryout AS t ON c.cname = t.cname WHERE t.ppos = "goalie")

soccer_2.question: What are the names of all the states with college students playing in the mid position but no goalies?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.state FROM College AS c JOIN Tryout AS t ON c.cName = t.cName WHERE t.pPos = "mid" AND t.pID NOT IN (SELECT pID FROM Tryout WHERE pPos = "goalie")

soccer_2.question: How many states that have some college students playing in the mid position but not in the goalie position.
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT t1.state) FROM college AS t1 JOIN tryout AS t2 ON t1.cname  =  t2.cname WHERE t2.ppos  =  "Mid" AND t2.ppos NOT IN (SELECT ppos FROM tryout WHERE ppos  =  "Goalie")

soccer_2.question: What is the count of states with college students playing in the mid position but not as goalies?
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT c.state) FROM college AS c JOIN tryout AS t ON c.cname = t.cname JOIN player AS p ON t.pid = p.pid WHERE t.ppos = "mid" AND t.ppos != "goalie"

soccer_2.question: Find the states where have the colleges whose enrollments are less than the largest size.
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT state FROM college WHERE enr < (SELECT MAX(enr) FROM college)

soccer_2.question: What are the states with colleges that have enrollments less than the some other college?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT c1.state FROM college AS c1 WHERE c1.enr < (SELECT MAX(c2.enr) FROM college AS c2 WHERE c2.cName != c1.cName)

soccer_2.question: Find names of colleges with enrollment greater than that of some (at least one) college in the FL state.
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr > (SELECT MAX(enr) FROM College WHERE state = "FL")

soccer_2.question: What are the names of the colleges that are larger than at least one college in Florida?
soccer_2.query: SELECT DISTINCT cName FROM College WHERE enr > (SELECT MAX(enr) FROM College WHERE state = 'Florida')

soccer_2.question: Find names of all colleges whose enrollment is greater than that of all colleges in the FL state.
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr > (SELECT MAX(enr) FROM College WHERE state = "FL")

soccer_2.question: What are the names of all colleges with a larger enrollment than the largest college in Florida?
soccer_2.query: SELECT cName FROM College WHERE enr > (SELECT MAX(enr) FROM College WHERE state = 'Florida')

soccer_2.question: What is the total number of enrollment of schools that do not have any goalie player?
soccer_2.query: SELECT sum(enr) FROM college WHERE cName NOT IN (SELECT cName FROM tryout WHERE pPos = 'goalie')

soccer_2.question: What is the total number of students enrolled in schools without any goalies?
soccer_2.query: SELECT sum(enr) FROM college WHERE cName NOT IN (SELECT cName FROM tryout WHERE pPos = "goalie")

soccer_2.question: What is the number of states that has some college whose enrollment is larger than the average enrollment?
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT state) FROM college WHERE enr > (SELECT avg(enr) FROM college)

soccer_2.question: How many states have a college with more students than average?
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT state) FROM college WHERE enr > (SELECT avg(enr) FROM college)

soccer_2.question: What is the number of states that has some colleges whose enrollment is smaller than the average enrollment?
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT state) FROM college WHERE enr < (SELECT avg(enr) FROM college)

soccer_2.question: How many states have smaller colleges than average?
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT state) FROM college WHERE enr < (SELECT avg(enr) FROM college)

soccer_2.question: Find the name and training hours of players whose hours are below 1500.
soccer_2.query: SELECT pname, ycard FROM player WHERE ycard < 1500

soccer_2.question: How many students got accepted after the tryout?
soccer_2.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Tryout WHERE decision  =  'Accepted'

soccer_2.question: What is average enrollment of colleges in the state FL?
soccer_2.query: SELECT avg(enr) FROM college WHERE state  =  'FL'

device.question: How many devices are there?
device.query: SELECT count(*) FROM device

device.question: Count the number of devices.
device.query: SELECT count(*) FROM device

device.question: List the carriers of devices in ascending alphabetical order.
device.query: SELECT DISTINCT Carrier FROM device ORDER BY Carrier ASC

device.question: What are the different carriers for devices, listed in alphabetical order?
device.query: SELECT DISTINCT Carrier FROM device ORDER BY Carrier ASC

device.question: What are the carriers of devices whose software platforms are not "Android"?
device.query: SELECT DISTINCT Carrier FROM device WHERE Software_Platform <> 'Android'

device.question: Return the device carriers that do not have Android as their software platform.
device.query: SELECT DISTINCT Carrier FROM device WHERE Software_Platform <> 'Android'

device.question: What are the names of shops in ascending order of open year?
device.query: SELECT Shop_Name FROM shop ORDER BY Open_Year ASC

device.question: Return the names of shops, ordered by year of opening ascending.
device.query: SELECT Shop_Name FROM shop ORDER BY Open_Year ASC

device.question: What is the average quantity of stocks?
device.query: SELECT avg(Quantity) FROM stock

device.question: Give the average quantity of stocks.
device.query: SELECT avg(Quantity) FROM stock

device.question: What are the names and location of the shops in ascending alphabetical order of name.
device.query: SELECT Shop_Name, Location FROM shop ORDER BY Shop_Name ASC

device.question: Return the names and locations of shops, ordered by name in alphabetical order.
device.query: SELECT Shop_Name, Location FROM shop ORDER BY Shop_Name ASC

device.question: How many different software platforms are there for devices?
device.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Software_Platform) FROM device

device.question: Count the number of different software platforms.
device.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT Software_Platform) FROM device

device.question: List the open date of open year of the shop named "Apple".
device.query: SELECT Open_Date, Open_Year FROM shop WHERE Shop_Name = 'Apple'

device.question: What are the open dates and years for the shop named Apple?
device.query: SELECT Open_Date, Open_Year FROM shop WHERE Shop_Name = "Apple"

device.question: List the name of the shop with the latest open year.
device.query: SELECT Shop_Name FROM shop ORDER BY Open_Year DESC LIMIT 1

device.question: What is the shop name corresponding to the shop that opened in the most recent year?
device.query: SELECT Shop_Name FROM shop ORDER BY Open_Year DESC LIMIT 1

device.question: Show names of shops and the carriers of devices they have in stock.
device.query: SELECT T2.Shop_Name ,  T1.Carrier FROM stock AS T3 JOIN device AS T1 ON T3.Device_ID  =  T1.Device_ID JOIN shop AS T2 ON T3.Shop_ID  =  T2.Shop_ID

device.question: What are the names of device shops, and what are the carriers that they carry devices in stock for?
device.query: SELECT T2.Shop_Name, T1.Carrier FROM device AS T1 JOIN stock AS T3 ON T1.Device_ID = T3.Device_ID JOIN shop AS T2 ON T3.Shop_ID = T2.Shop_ID GROUP BY T2.Shop_Name, T1.Carrier

device.question: Show names of shops that have more than one kind of device in stock.
device.query: SELECT T2.Shop_Name FROM stock AS T1 JOIN shop AS T2 ON T1.Shop_ID  =  T2.Shop_ID GROUP BY T2.Shop_Name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1.Device_ID) > 1

device.question: What are the names of shops that have more than a single kind of device in stock?
device.query: SELECT T2.Shop_Name FROM stock AS T1 JOIN shop AS T2 ON T1.Shop_ID  =  T2.Shop_ID GROUP BY T2.Shop_Name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T1.Device_ID) > 1

device.question: Show the name of the shop that has the most kind of devices in stock.
device.query: SELECT T2.Shop_Name FROM stock AS T1 JOIN shop AS T2 ON T1.Shop_ID = T2.Shop_ID GROUP BY T1.Shop_ID ORDER BY count(DISTINCT T1.Device_ID) DESC LIMIT 1

device.question: What is the name of the shop that has the most different kinds of devices in stock?
device.query: SELECT T2.Shop_Name FROM stock AS T1 JOIN shop AS T2 ON T1.Shop_ID  =  T2.Shop_ID GROUP BY T1.Shop_ID ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT T1.Device_ID) DESC LIMIT 1

device.question: Show the name of the shop that have the largest quantity of devices in stock.
device.query: SELECT T2.Shop_Name FROM stock AS T1 JOIN shop AS T2 ON T1.Shop_ID = T2.Shop_ID GROUP BY T2.Shop_Name ORDER BY sum(T1.Quantity) DESC LIMIT 1

device.question: What is the name of the shop that has the greatest quantity of devices in stock?
device.query: SELECT T2.Shop_Name FROM stock AS T1 JOIN shop AS T2 ON T1.Shop_ID  =  T2.Shop_ID WHERE T1.Quantity  =  (SELECT MAX(Quantity) FROM stock)

device.question: Please show different software platforms and the corresponding number of devices using each.
device.query: SELECT Software_Platform, COUNT(*) FROM device GROUP BY Software_Platform

device.question: What are the different software platforms for devices, and how many devices have each?
device.query: SELECT Software_Platform, COUNT(*) FROM device GROUP BY Software_Platform

device.question: Please show the software platforms of devices in descending order of the count.
device.query: SELECT Software_Platform, COUNT(*) AS count FROM device GROUP BY Software_Platform ORDER BY count DESC

device.question: What are the different software platforms for devices, ordered by frequency descending?
device.query: SELECT Software_Platform, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM device GROUP BY Software_Platform ORDER BY frequency DESC

device.question: List the software platform shared by the greatest number of devices.
device.query: SELECT Software_Platform FROM device GROUP BY Software_Platform ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

device.question: What is the software platform that is most common amongst all devices?
device.query: SELECT Software_Platform FROM device GROUP BY Software_Platform ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

device.question: List the names of shops that have no devices in stock.
device.query: SELECT Shop_Name FROM shop WHERE Shop_ID NOT IN (SELECT Shop_ID FROM stock)

device.question: What are the names of shops that do not have any devices in stock?
device.query: SELECT Shop_Name FROM shop WHERE Shop_ID NOT IN (SELECT Shop_ID FROM stock)

device.question: Show the locations shared by shops with open year later than 2012 and shops with open year before 2008.
device.query: SELECT T1.Location FROM shop AS T1 JOIN (SELECT Location FROM shop WHERE Open_Year > 2012) AS T2 ON T1.Location = T2.Location JOIN (SELECT Location FROM shop WHERE Open_Year < 2008) AS T3 ON T1.Location = T3.Location

device.question: Which locations contains both shops that opened after the year 2012 and shops that opened before 2008?
device.query: SELECT T1.Location FROM shop AS T1 JOIN (SELECT Location FROM shop WHERE Open_Year > 2012 INTERSECT SELECT Location FROM shop WHERE Open_Year < 2008) AS T2 ON T1.Location = T2.Location

device.question: List the carriers of devices that have no devices in stock.
device.query: SELECT DISTINCT Carrier FROM device WHERE Device_ID NOT IN (SELECT Device_ID FROM stock)

device.question: What are the carriers of devices that are not in stock anywhere?
device.query: SELECT DISTINCT Carrier FROM device WHERE Device_ID NOT IN (SELECT Device_ID FROM stock)

device.question: Show the carriers of devices in stock at more than one shop.
device.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.Carrier FROM device AS T1 JOIN stock AS T2 ON T1.Device_ID  =  T2.Device_ID GROUP BY T1.Carrier HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T2.Shop_ID)  >  1

device.question: What are the carriers of devices that are in stock in more than a single shop?
device.query: SELECT DISTINCT d.Carrier FROM device d JOIN stock s ON d.Device_ID = s.Device_ID GROUP BY d.Carrier HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT s.Shop_ID) > 1

music_2.question: Find all the songs performed by artist with last name "Heilo"
music_2.query: SELECT Songs.Title FROM Songs JOIN Performance ON Songs.SongId = Performance.SongId JOIN Band ON Performance.Bandmate = Band.Id WHERE Band.Lastname = "Heilo"

music_2.question: What are the names of the songs by the artist whose last name is "Heilo"?
music_2.query: SELECT Songs.Title FROM Songs JOIN Tracklists ON Songs.SongId = Tracklists.SongId JOIN Albums ON Tracklists.AlbumId = Albums.AId JOIN Band ON Band.Id = ANY (SELECT BandmateId FROM Instruments WHERE Instruments.SongId = Songs.SongId) WHERE Band.Lastname = "Heilo"

music_2.question: Find all the songs produced by artists with first name "Marianne".
music_2.query: SELECT T1.Title FROM Songs AS T1 JOIN Performance AS T2 ON T1.SongId  =  T2.SongId JOIN Band AS T3 ON T2.Bandmate  =  T3.Id WHERE T3.Firstname  =  'Marianne'

music_2.question: What are the names of all songs produced by the artist with the first name "Marianne"?
music_2.query: SELECT T1.Title FROM Songs AS T1 JOIN Performance AS T2 ON T1.SongId = T2.SongId JOIN Band AS T3 ON T2.Bandmate = T3.Id WHERE T3.Firstname = 'Marianne'

music_2.question: Who performed the song named "Badlands"? Show the first name and the last name.
music_2.query: SELECT T2.Firstname, T2.Lastname FROM Songs AS T1 JOIN Performance AS T3 ON T1.SongId = T3.SongId JOIN Band AS T2 ON T3.Bandmate = T2.Id WHERE T1.Title = "Badlands"

music_2.question: What are the first and last names of the artist who perfomed the song "Badlands"?
music_2.query: SELECT T2.Firstname, T2.Lastname FROM Songs AS T1 JOIN Band AS T2 ON T1.SongId  =  T2.Id JOIN Performance AS T3 ON T1.SongId  =  T3.SongId WHERE T1.Title  =  "Badlands"

music_2.question: Who is performing in the back stage position for the song "Badlands"? Show the first name and the last name.
music_2.query: SELECT B.Firstname, B.Lastname FROM Band AS B JOIN Performance AS P ON B.Id = P.Bandmate WHERE P.SongId = (SELECT SongId FROM Songs WHERE Title = "Badlands") AND P.StagePosition = "back stage"
