dorm_1.query: SELECT fname ,  lname FROM student WHERE major NOT IN (SELECT major FROM student GROUP BY major ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

dorm_1.question: Find the number of students whose age is older than the average age for each gender.
dorm_1.query: SELECT t1.sex, count(*) FROM student AS t1 WHERE t1.age > (SELECT AVG(age) FROM student AS t2 WHERE t1.sex = t2.sex) GROUP BY t1.sex

dorm_1.question: How many students are older than average for each gender?
dorm_1.query: SELECT sex, COUNT(*) FROM Student WHERE age > (SELECT AVG(age) FROM Student) GROUP BY sex

dorm_1.question: Find the average age of students living in each dorm and the name of dorm.
dorm_1.query: SELECT t2.dorm_name, AVG(t1.age) FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t3 ON t1.stuid = t3.stuid JOIN dorm AS t2 ON t3.dormid = t2.dormid GROUP BY t2.dorm_name

dorm_1.question: What is the average age for each dorm and what are the names of each dorm?
dorm_1.query: SELECT t2.dorm_name, AVG(t1.age) FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t3 ON t1.stuid = t3.stuid JOIN dorm AS t2 ON t3.dormid = t2.dormid GROUP BY t2.dorm_name

dorm_1.question: For each dorm, how many amenities does it have?
dorm_1.query: SELECT t1.dorm_name, count(*) FROM dorm_amenity AS t2 JOIN has_amenity AS t3 ON t2.amenid = t3.amenid JOIN dorm AS t1 ON t3.dormid = t1.dormid GROUP BY t1.dorm_name

dorm_1.question: Find the number of students who is older than 20 in each dorm.
dorm_1.query: SELECT dorm_name, COUNT(*) FROM Student JOIN Lives_in ON Student.StuID = Lives_in.stuid JOIN Dorm ON Lives_in.dormid = Dorm.dormid WHERE Age > 20 GROUP BY dorm_name

dorm_1.question: How many students are older than 20 in each dorm?
dorm_1.query: SELECT dorm_name, COUNT(*) FROM Student JOIN Lives_in ON Student.StuID = Lives_in.stuid JOIN Dorm ON Lives_in.dormid = Dorm.dormid WHERE Age > 20 GROUP BY dorm_name

dorm_1.question: Find the first name of students who are living in the Smith Hall.
dorm_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT fname FROM student AS T1 JOIN lives_in AS T2 ON T1.stuid = T2.stuid JOIN dorm AS T3 ON T2.dormid = T3.dormid WHERE T3.dorm_name = "Smith Hall"

dorm_1.question: What are the first names of all students in Smith Hall?
dorm_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT fname FROM student AS T1 JOIN lives_in AS T2 ON T1.stuid = T2.stuid JOIN dorm AS T3 ON T2.dormid = T3.dormid WHERE T3.dorm_name = "Smith Hall"

dorm_1.question: Find the average age of students who are living in the dorm with the largest capacity.
dorm_1.query: SELECT AVG(age) FROM student WHERE stuid IN (SELECT stuid FROM lives_in WHERE dormid = (SELECT dormid FROM dorm ORDER BY student_capacity DESC LIMIT 1))

dorm_1.question: What is the average age of students who are living in the dorm with the largest capacity?
dorm_1.query: SELECT AVG(age) FROM student AS T1 JOIN lives_in AS T2 ON T1.stuid = T2.stuid JOIN dorm AS T3 ON T2.dormid = T3.dormid WHERE T3.student_capacity = (SELECT MAX(student_capacity) FROM dorm)

dorm_1.question: Find the total number of students living in the male dorm (with gender M).
dorm_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Lives_in AS T1 JOIN Dorm AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid WHERE T2.gender  =  "M"

dorm_1.question: What are the total number of students who are living in a male dorm?
dorm_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Student AS T1 JOIN Lives_in AS T2 ON T1.StuID = T2.stuid JOIN Dorm AS T3 ON T2.dormid = T3.dormid WHERE T3.gender = "M"

dorm_1.question: Find the number of female students (with F sex) living in Smith Hall
dorm_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t2 ON t1.stuid  =  t2.stuid JOIN dorm AS t3 ON t2.dormid  =  t3.dormid WHERE t1.sex  =  "F" AND t3.dorm_name  =  "Smith Hall"

dorm_1.question: How many female students live in Smith Hall?
dorm_1.query: SELECT count(*) FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t2 ON t1.stuid  =  t2.stuid JOIN dorm AS t3 ON t2.dormid  =  t3.dormid WHERE t1.sex  =  "F" AND t3.dorm_name  =  "Smith Hall"

dorm_1.question: Find the name of amenities Smith Hall dorm have.
dorm_1.query: SELECT amenity_name FROM Dorm_amenity AS T1 JOIN Has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.amenid = T2.amenid WHERE T2.dormid = (SELECT dormid FROM Dorm WHERE dorm_name = "Smith Hall")

dorm_1.question: What are the names of the amenities that Smith Hall has?
dorm_1.query: SELECT amenity_name FROM Dorm_amenity AS T1 JOIN Has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.amenid = T2.amenid JOIN Dorm AS T3 ON T2.dormid = T3.dormid WHERE T3.dorm_name = "Smith Hall"

dorm_1.question: Find the name of amenities Smith Hall dorm have. ordered the results by amenity names.
dorm_1.query: SELECT t2.amenity_name FROM dorm AS t1 JOIN has_amenity AS t3 ON t1.dormid  =  t3.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS t2 ON t3.amenid  =  t2.amenid WHERE t1.dorm_name  =  "Smith Hall" ORDER BY t2.amenity_name ASC

dorm_1.question: What amenities does Smith Hall have in alphabetical order?
dorm_1.query: SELECT amenity_name FROM dorm_amenity AS t1 JOIN has_amenity AS t2 ON t1.amenid  =  t2.amenid WHERE t2.dormid  =  "Smith Hall" ORDER BY amenity_name ASC

dorm_1.question: Find the name of amenity that is most common in all dorms.
dorm_1.query: SELECT T2.amenity_name FROM Has_amenity AS T1 JOIN Dorm_amenity AS T2 ON T1.amenid = T2.amenid GROUP BY T2.amenid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dorm_1.question: What is the most common amenity in the dorms?
dorm_1.query: SELECT t2.amenity_name FROM has_amenity AS t1 JOIN dorm_amenity AS t2 ON t1.amenid  =  t2.amenid GROUP BY t1.amenid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dorm_1.question: Find the first name of students who are living in the dorm that has most number of amenities.
dorm_1.query: SELECT t1.fname FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid JOIN dorm AS t3 ON t2.dormid = t3.dormid JOIN has_amenity AS t4 ON t3.dormid = t4.dormid GROUP BY t3.dormid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dorm_1.question: What are the first names of all students who live in the dorm with the most amenities?
dorm_1.query: SELECT T1.fname FROM Student AS T1 JOIN Lives_in AS T2 ON T1.StuID = T2.stuid JOIN Has_amenity AS T3 ON T2.dormid = T3.dormid GROUP BY T2.dormid ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

dorm_1.question: Find the name and capacity of the dorm with least number of amenities.
dorm_1.query: SELECT T1.dorm_name, T1.student_capacity FROM Dorm AS T1 LEFT JOIN Has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid = T2.dormid GROUP BY T1.dormid ORDER BY COUNT(T2.amenid) ASC LIMIT 1

dorm_1.question: What is the name and capacity of the dorm with the fewest amount of amenities?
dorm_1.query: SELECT t1.dorm_name, t1.student_capacity FROM dorm AS t1 JOIN has_amenity AS t2 ON t1.dormid = t2.dormid GROUP BY t1.dormid ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

dorm_1.question: Find the name of dorms that do not have amenity TV Lounge.
dorm_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.dorm_name FROM Dorm AS T1 LEFT JOIN Has_amenity AS T2 ON T1.dormid  =  T2.dormid LEFT JOIN Dorm_amenity AS T3 ON T2.amenid  =  T3.amenid WHERE T3.amenity_name IS NULL OR T3.amenity_name != 'TV Lounge'

dorm_1.question: What are the names of the dorm that does not have a TV Lounge?
dorm_1.query: SELECT dorm_name FROM Dorm WHERE dormid NOT IN (SELECT dormid FROM Has_amenity WHERE amenid = (SELECT amenid FROM Dorm_amenity WHERE amenity_name = "TV Lounge"))

dorm_1.question: Find the first and last name of students who are living in the dorms that have amenity TV Lounge.
dorm_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.fname, t1.lname FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid JOIN dorm AS t3 ON t2.dormid = t3.dormid JOIN has_amenity AS t4 ON t3.dormid = t4.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS t5 ON t4.amenid = t5.amenid WHERE t5.amenity_name = "TV Lounge"

dorm_1.question: What are the first and last names of all students who are living in a dorm with a TV Lounge?
dorm_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.fname, t1.lname FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid JOIN has_amenity AS t3 ON t2.dormid = t3.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS t4 ON t3.amenid = t4.amenid WHERE t4.amenity_name = "TV Lounge"

dorm_1.question: Find the first name and age of students who are living in the dorms that do not have amenity TV Lounge.
dorm_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.fname, t1.age FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid JOIN dorm AS t3 ON t2.dormid = t3.dormid WHERE t3.dormid NOT IN (SELECT dormid FROM has_amenity WHERE amenid = (SELECT amenid FROM dorm_amenity WHERE amenity_name = 'TV Lounge'))

dorm_1.question: What is the first name and age of every student who lives in a dorm with a TV Lounge?
dorm_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.fname, t1.age FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid JOIN has_amenity AS t3 ON t2.dormid = t3.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS t4 ON t3.amenid = t4.amenid WHERE t4.amenity_name = "TV Lounge"

dorm_1.question: Find the name of amenities of the dorm where the student with last name Smith is living in.
dorm_1.query: SELECT t3.amenity_name FROM student AS t1 JOIN lives_in AS t2 ON t1.stuid  =  t2.stuid JOIN dorm AS t3 ON t2.dormid  =  t3.dormid JOIN has_amenity AS t4 ON t3.dormid  =  t4.dormid JOIN dorm_amenity AS t5 ON t4.amenid  =  t5.amenid WHERE t1.lname  =  "Smith"

dorm_1.question: What are the amenities in the dorm that a student who has the last name of Smith lives in?
dorm_1.query: SELECT T3.amenity_name FROM Student AS T1 JOIN Lives_in AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  T2.StuID JOIN Dorm AS T3 ON T2.dormid  =  T3.dormid JOIN Has_amenity AS T4 ON T3.dormid  =  T4.dormid JOIN Dorm_amenity AS T5 ON T4.amenid  =  T5.amenid WHERE T1.lname  =  'Smith'

dorm_1.question: How many different majors are there and how many different city codes are there for each student?
dorm_1.query: SELECT major, city_code, count(*) FROM Student GROUP BY major, city_code

dorm_1.question: Find the number of amenities for each of the dorms that can accommodate more than 100 students.
dorm_1.query: SELECT t1.dorm_name, count(*) FROM dorm AS t1 JOIN has_amenity AS t2 ON t1.dormid  =  t2.dormid WHERE t1.student_capacity > 100 GROUP BY t1.dormid, t1.dorm_name

customer_complaints.question: How many customers are there?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT count(*) FROM customers

customer_complaints.question: Count the number of customers.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Customers

customer_complaints.question: Find the emails and phone numbers of all the customers, ordered by email address and phone number.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT email_address, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY email_address, phone_number

customer_complaints.question: What are the emails and phone numbers of all customers, sorted by email address and phone number?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT email_address, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY email_address, phone_number

customer_complaints.question: Which city has the least number of customers whose type code is "Good Credit Rating"?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT town_city FROM customers WHERE customer_type_code = 'Good Credit Rating' GROUP BY town_city ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: Return the city with the customer type code "Good Credit Rating" that had the fewest customers.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t2.town_city FROM customers AS t1 JOIN addresses AS t2 ON t1.address_line_1  =  t2.address_content WHERE t1.customer_type_code  =  "Good Credit Rating" GROUP BY t2.town_city ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: List the name of all products along with the number of complaints that they have received.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t1.product_name, COUNT(t2.complaint_id) AS num_complaints FROM products AS t1 LEFT JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.product_id = t2.product_id GROUP BY t1.product_id ORDER BY num_complaints DESC

customer_complaints.question: What are all the different product names, and how many complains has each received?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t1.product_name, count(*) FROM products AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.product_id = t2.product_id GROUP BY t1.product_name

customer_complaints.question: Find the emails of customers who has filed a complaints of the product with the most complaints.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t2.email_address FROM complaints AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id = t2.customer_id WHERE t1.product_id = (SELECT product_id FROM complaints GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

customer_complaints.question: What are the emails of customers who have filed complaints on the product which has had the greatest number of complaints?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t2.email_address FROM complaints AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id = t2.customer_id WHERE t1.product_id = (SELECT product_id FROM complaints GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

customer_complaints.question: Which products has been complained by the customer who has filed least amount of complaints?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t1.product_name FROM products AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.product_id = t2.product_id JOIN customers AS t3 ON t2.customer_id = t3.customer_id GROUP BY t1.product_id ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT t2.complaint_id) ASC LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: Return the names of products that have had complaints filed by the customer who has filed the fewest complaints.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t3.product_name FROM complaints AS t1 JOIN customers AS t2 ON t1.customer_id = t2.customer_id JOIN products AS t3 ON t1.product_id = t3.product_id WHERE t2.customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM complaints WHERE customer_id = customers.customer_id) ASC LIMIT 1)

customer_complaints.question: What is the phone number of the customer who has filed the most recent complaint?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM complaints ORDER BY date_complaint_raised DESC LIMIT 1)

customer_complaints.question: Return the phone number of the customer who filed the complaint that was raised most recently.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t1.phone_number FROM customers AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.customer_id = t2.customer_id ORDER BY t2.date_complaint_raised DESC LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: Find the email and phone number of the customers who have never filed a complaint before.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM complaints)

customer_complaints.question: What are the emails and phone numbers of custoemrs who have never filed a complaint?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT email_address, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Complaints)

customer_complaints.question: Find the phone number of all the customers and staff.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT phone_number FROM customers UNION SELECT phone_number FROM staff

customer_complaints.question: What are the phone numbers of all customers and all staff members?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT phone_number FROM customers UNION SELECT phone_number FROM staff

customer_complaints.question: What is the description of the product named "Chocolate"?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT product_description FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Chocolate'

customer_complaints.question: Return the description of the product called "Chocolate".
customer_complaints.query: SELECT product_description FROM products WHERE product_name = "Chocolate"

customer_complaints.question: Find the name and category of the most expensive product.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT product_name, product_category_code FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: What is the name and category code of the product with the highest price?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT product_name, product_category_code FROM products WHERE product_price = (SELECT MAX(product_price) FROM products)

customer_complaints.question: Find the prices of products which has never received a single complaint.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT product_price FROM products WHERE product_id NOT IN (SELECT product_id FROM complaints)

customer_complaints.question: What are the prices of products that have never gotten a complaint?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT product_price FROM products WHERE product_id NOT IN (SELECT product_id FROM complaints)

customer_complaints.question: What is the average price of the products for each category?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT product_category_code, AVG(product_price) FROM products GROUP BY product_category_code

customer_complaints.question: Return the average price of products that have each category code.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT product_category_code, AVG(product_price) FROM products GROUP BY product_category_code

customer_complaints.question: Find the last name of the staff member who processed the complaint of the cheapest product.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t1.last_name FROM staff AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.staff_id = t2.staff_id JOIN products AS t3 ON t2.product_id = t3.product_id WHERE t3.product_price = (SELECT MIN(product_price) FROM products) ORDER BY t2.date_complaint_closed DESC LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: What is the last name of the staff member in charge of the complaint on the product with the lowest price?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t1.last_name FROM staff AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.staff_id = t2.staff_id JOIN products AS t3 ON t2.product_id = t3.product_id WHERE t3.product_price = (SELECT MIN(product_price) FROM products) LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: Which complaint status has more than 3 records on file?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT complaint_status_code FROM complaints GROUP BY complaint_status_code HAVING count(*) > 3

customer_complaints.question: Return complaint status codes have more than 3 corresponding complaints?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT complaint_status_code FROM complaints GROUP BY complaint_status_code HAVING count(*) > 3

customer_complaints.question: Find the last name of the staff whose email address contains "wrau".
customer_complaints.query: SELECT last_name FROM staff WHERE email_address LIKE "%wrau%"

customer_complaints.question: What are the last names of staff with email addressed containing the substring "wrau"?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT last_name FROM staff WHERE email_address LIKE '%wrau%'

customer_complaints.question: How many customers are there in the customer type with the most customers?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT count(*) FROM customers WHERE customer_type_code = (SELECT customer_type_code FROM customers GROUP BY customer_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

customer_complaints.question: Count the number of customers that have the customer type that is most common.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Customers WHERE customer_type_code = (SELECT customer_type_code FROM Customers GROUP BY customer_type_code ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

customer_complaints.question: What is the last name of the staff who has handled the first ever complaint?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t1.last_name FROM staff AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.staff_id = t2.staff_id WHERE t2.date_complaint_raised = (SELECT MIN(date_complaint_raised) FROM complaints) LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: Return the last name of the staff member who handled the complaint with the earliest date raised.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t1.last_name FROM staff AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.staff_id = t2.staff_id ORDER BY t2.date_complaint_raised ASC LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: How many distinct complaint type codes are there in the database?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT complaint_type_code) FROM complaints

customer_complaints.question: Count the number of different complaint type codes.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT complaint_type_code) FROM complaints

customer_complaints.question: Find the address line 1 and 2 of the customer with email "vbogisich@example.org".
customer_complaints.query: SELECT address_line_1, address_line_2 FROM customers WHERE email_address = 'vbogisich@example.org'

customer_complaints.question: What are lines 1 and 2 of the addressed of the customer with the email "vbogisich@example.org"?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT address_line_1, address_line_2 FROM customers WHERE email_address = 'vbogisich@example.org'

customer_complaints.question: Find the number of complaints with Product Failure type for each complaint status.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT complaint_status_code, COUNT(*) FROM complaints WHERE complaint_type_code = 'Product Failure' GROUP BY complaint_status_code

customer_complaints.question: Of complaints with the type code "Product Failure", how many had each different status code?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT complaint_status_code, COUNT(*) FROM complaints WHERE complaint_type_code = 'Product Failure' GROUP BY complaint_status_code

customer_complaints.question: What is first names of the top 5 staff who have handled the greatest number of complaints?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT first_name FROM staff AS s JOIN complaints AS c ON s.staff_id = c.staff_id GROUP BY s.staff_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5

customer_complaints.question: Return the first names of the 5 staff members who have handled the most complaints.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT t1.first_name FROM staff AS t1 JOIN complaints AS t2 ON t1.staff_id = t2.staff_id GROUP BY t1.staff_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5

customer_complaints.question: Which state has the most customers?
customer_complaints.query: SELECT state, COUNT(*) FROM customers GROUP BY state ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

customer_complaints.question: Give the state that has the most customers.
customer_complaints.query: SELECT state, COUNT(*) FROM customers GROUP BY state ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

workshop_paper.question: How many submissions are there?
workshop_paper.query: SELECT count(*) FROM submission

workshop_paper.question: Count the number of submissions.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM submission

workshop_paper.question: List the authors of submissions in ascending order of scores.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author FROM submission ORDER BY Scores ASC

workshop_paper.question: Find the author for each submission and list them in ascending order of submission score.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author FROM submission ORDER BY Scores ASC

workshop_paper.question: What are the authors of submissions and their colleges?
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author, College FROM submission

workshop_paper.question: For each submission, show the author and their affiliated college.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author, College FROM submission

workshop_paper.question: Show the names of authors from college "Florida" or "Temple"
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author FROM submission WHERE College IN ('Florida', 'Temple')

workshop_paper.question: Which authors with submissions are from college "Florida" or "Temple"?
workshop_paper.query: SELECT DISTINCT Author FROM submission WHERE College IN ('Florida', 'Temple')

workshop_paper.question: What is the average score of submissions?
workshop_paper.query: SELECT avg(Scores) FROM submission

workshop_paper.question: Compute the average score of submissions.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT avg(Scores) FROM submission

workshop_paper.question: What is the author of the submission with the highest score?
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author FROM submission WHERE Scores = (SELECT MAX(Scores) FROM submission)

workshop_paper.question: Find the author who achieved the highest score in a submission.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author FROM submission WHERE Scores = (SELECT MAX(Scores) FROM submission)

workshop_paper.question: Show different colleges along with the number of authors of submission from each college.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT College, COUNT(DISTINCT Author) FROM submission GROUP BY College

workshop_paper.question: For each college, return the college name and the count of authors with submissions from that college.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT College, COUNT(DISTINCT Author) AS Num_of_Authors FROM submission GROUP BY College

workshop_paper.question: Show the most common college of authors of submissions.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT College FROM submission GROUP BY College ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

workshop_paper.question: Which college has the most authors with submissions?
workshop_paper.query: SELECT College, COUNT(DISTINCT Author) AS num_authors FROM submission GROUP BY College ORDER BY num_authors DESC LIMIT 1

workshop_paper.question: Show the colleges that have both authors with submission score larger than 90 and authors with submission score smaller than 80.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT College FROM submission WHERE Scores > 90 AND College IN (SELECT College FROM submission WHERE Scores < 80)

workshop_paper.question: Which colleges have both authors with submission score above 90 and authors with submission score below 80?
workshop_paper.query: SELECT College FROM submission WHERE Scores > 90 AND College IN (SELECT College FROM submission WHERE Scores < 80) GROUP BY College

workshop_paper.question: Show the authors of submissions and the acceptance results of their submissions.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT T1.Author ,  T2.Result FROM submission AS T1 JOIN acceptance AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID

workshop_paper.question: For each submission, find its author and acceptance result.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT T1.Author ,  T3.Result FROM submission AS T1 JOIN acceptance AS T3 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T3.Submission_ID

workshop_paper.question: Show the result of the submission with the highest score.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT T3.Result FROM submission AS T1 JOIN acceptance AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T2.Submission_ID JOIN acceptance AS T3 ON T1.Submission_ID  =  T3.Submission_ID WHERE T1.Scores  =  (SELECT MAX(Scores) FROM submission)

workshop_paper.question: Which submission received the highest score in acceptance result. Show me the result.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT MAX(Scores) FROM submission AS T1 JOIN acceptance AS T2 ON T1.Submission_ID = T2.Submission_ID WHERE Result = 'Accepted'

workshop_paper.question: Show each author and the number of workshops they submitted to.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT T2.Author, COUNT(*) FROM submission AS T1 JOIN Acceptance AS T3 ON T1.Submission_ID = T3.Submission_ID JOIN workshop AS T4 ON T3.Workshop_ID = T4.Workshop_ID JOIN member AS T2 ON T1.Author = T2.Member_ID GROUP BY T2.Author

workshop_paper.question: How many workshops did each author submit to? Return the author name and the number of workshops.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT T2.Author, COUNT(DISTINCT T3.Workshop_ID) AS num_workshops FROM submission AS T2 JOIN Acceptance AS T3 ON T2.Submission_ID = T3.Submission_ID GROUP BY T2.Author

workshop_paper.question: Show the authors who have submissions to more than one workshop.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author FROM submission WHERE Submission_ID IN (SELECT Submission_ID FROM Acceptance GROUP BY Submission_ID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Workshop_ID) > 1)

workshop_paper.question: Which authors have submitted to more than one workshop?
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author FROM submission WHERE Author IN (SELECT Author FROM submission GROUP BY Author HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT Workshop_ID) > 1)

workshop_paper.question: Show the date and venue of each workshop in ascending alphabetical order of the venue.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Date, Venue FROM workshop ORDER BY Venue ASC

workshop_paper.question: Sort the each workshop in alphabetical order of the venue. Return the date and venue of each workshop.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Date, Venue FROM workshop ORDER BY Venue ASC

workshop_paper.question: List the authors who do not have submission to any workshop.
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author FROM submission WHERE Author NOT IN (SELECT Author FROM Acceptance)

workshop_paper.question: Which authors did not submit to any workshop?
workshop_paper.query: SELECT Author FROM submission WHERE Author NOT IN (SELECT Author FROM Acceptance)

tracking_share_transactions.question: Find the number of investors in total.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Investors

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show all investor details.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT * FROM Investors

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show all distinct lot details.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT DISTINCT lot_details FROM Lots

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the maximum amount of transaction.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT MAX(amount_of_transaction) FROM Transactions

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show all date and share count of transactions.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT date_of_transaction, share_count FROM Transactions

tracking_share_transactions.question: What is the total share of transactions?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT sum(share_count) FROM Transactions_Lots

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show all transaction ids with transaction code 'PUR'.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT transaction_id FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type_code = 'PUR'

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show all dates of transactions whose type code is "SALE".
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT date_of_transaction FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type_code = 'SALE'

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the average amount of transactions with type code "SALE".
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT avg(amount_of_transaction) FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type_code = "SALE"

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the description of transaction type with code "PUR".
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT transaction_type_description FROM Ref_Transaction_Types WHERE transaction_type_code = "PUR"

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the minimum amount of transactions whose type code is "PUR" and whose share count is bigger than 50.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT MIN(amount_of_transaction) FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type_code = "PUR" AND share_count > 50

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the maximum share count of transactions where the amount is smaller than 10000
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT MAX(share_count) FROM Transactions WHERE amount_of_transaction < 10000

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the dates of transactions if the share count is bigger than 100 or the amount is bigger than 1000.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT date_of_transaction FROM Transactions WHERE share_count > 100 OR amount_of_transaction > 1000

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the transaction type descriptions and dates if the share count is smaller than 10.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT Ref_Transaction_Types.transaction_type_description, Transactions.date_of_transaction FROM Transactions JOIN Ref_Transaction_Types ON Transactions.transaction_type_code = Ref_Transaction_Types.transaction_type_code WHERE Transactions.share_count < 10

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show details of all investors if they make any transaction with share count greater than 100.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT DISTINCT Investors.* FROM Investors JOIN Transactions ON Investors.investor_id = Transactions.investor_id WHERE Transactions.share_count > 100

tracking_share_transactions.question: How many distinct transaction types are used in the transactions?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT transaction_type_code) FROM Transactions

tracking_share_transactions.question: Return the lot details and investor ids.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT lot_details, investor_id FROM Lots

tracking_share_transactions.question: Return the lot details of lots that belong to investors with details "l"?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT lot_details FROM Lots WHERE investor_id IN (SELECT investor_id FROM Investors WHERE Investor_details = "l")

tracking_share_transactions.question: What are the purchase details of transactions with amount bigger than 10000?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT purchase_details FROM Purchases JOIN Transactions ON Purchases.purchase_transaction_id = Transactions.transaction_id WHERE amount_of_transaction > 10000

tracking_share_transactions.question: What are the sale details and dates of transactions with amount smaller than 3000?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT sales_details, date_of_transaction FROM Transactions JOIN Sales ON Transactions.transaction_id = Sales.sales_transaction_id WHERE amount_of_transaction < 3000

tracking_share_transactions.question: What are the lot details of lots associated with transactions with share count smaller than 50?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT lot_details FROM Lots WHERE lot_id IN (SELECT lot_id FROM Transactions_Lots WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM Transactions WHERE share_count < 50))

tracking_share_transactions.question: What are the lot details of lots associated with transactions whose share count is bigger than 100 and whose type code is "PUR"?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT lot_details FROM Lots WHERE lot_id IN (SELECT lot_id FROM Transactions_Lots WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM Transactions WHERE share_count > 100 AND transaction_type_code = "PUR"))

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the average transaction amount for different transaction types.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT transaction_type_description, AVG(amount_of_transaction) FROM Transactions JOIN Ref_Transaction_Types ON Transactions.transaction_type_code = Ref_Transaction_Types.transaction_type_code GROUP BY transaction_type_description

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the maximum and minimum share count of different transaction types.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT transaction_type_code, MAX(share_count), MIN(share_count) FROM Transactions_Lots JOIN Transactions ON Transactions_Lots.transaction_id = Transactions.transaction_id GROUP BY transaction_type_code

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the average share count of transactions for different investors.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT investor_id, AVG(share_count) FROM Transactions GROUP BY investor_id

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the average share count of transactions each each investor, ordered by average share count.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT investor_id, AVG(share_count) AS avg_share_count FROM Transactions GROUP BY investor_id ORDER BY avg_share_count DESC

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the average amount of transactions for different investors.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT investor_id, AVG(amount_of_transaction) FROM Transactions GROUP BY investor_id

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the average amount of transactions for different lots.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT lot_id, AVG(amount_of_transaction) FROM Transactions_Lots GROUP BY lot_id

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the average amount of transactions for different lots, ordered by average amount of transactions.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT Lots.lot_id, avg(Transactions.amount_of_transaction) FROM Lots JOIN Transactions_Lots ON Lots.lot_id = Transactions_Lots.lot_id JOIN Transactions ON Transactions_Lots.transaction_id = Transactions.transaction_id GROUP BY Lots.lot_id ORDER BY avg(Transactions.amount_of_transaction) DESC

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the number of transactions with transaction type code "SALE" for different investors if it is larger than 0.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT investor_id, count(*) FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type_code = "SALE" GROUP BY investor_id HAVING count(*) > 0

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the number of transactions for different investors.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT investor_id, COUNT(*) FROM Transactions GROUP BY investor_id

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the transaction type code that occurs the fewest times.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT transaction_type_code FROM Transactions GROUP BY transaction_type_code ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the transaction type code that occurs the most frequently.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT transaction_type_code FROM Transactions GROUP BY transaction_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the description of the transaction type that occurs most frequently.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT transaction_type_description FROM Ref_Transaction_Types WHERE transaction_type_code = (SELECT transaction_type_code FROM Transactions GROUP BY transaction_type_code ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the id and details of the investor that has the largest number of transactions.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT investor_id, Investor_details FROM Investors WHERE investor_id IN (SELECT investor_id FROM Transactions GROUP BY investor_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1)

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the id and details for the investors who have the top 3 number of transactions.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT T1.investor_id, T1.investor_details FROM Investors AS T1 JOIN Transactions AS T2 ON T1.investor_id = T2.investor_id GROUP BY T1.investor_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the ids of the investors who have at least two transactions.
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT investor_id FROM Transactions GROUP BY investor_id HAVING count(*) >= 2

tracking_share_transactions.question: Show the ids and details of the investors who have at least two transactions with type code "SALE".
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT i.investor_id, i.investor_details FROM Investors i JOIN Transactions t ON i.investor_id = t.investor_id WHERE t.transaction_type_code = 'SALE' GROUP BY i.investor_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT t.transaction_id) >= 2

tracking_share_transactions.question: What are the dates of transactions with at least 100 share count or amount bigger than 100?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT date_of_transaction FROM Transactions WHERE share_count >= 100 OR amount_of_transaction > 100

tracking_share_transactions.question: What are the details of all sales and purchases?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT * FROM Sales UNION ALL SELECT * FROM Purchases

tracking_share_transactions.question: What are the details of the lots which are not used in any transactions?
tracking_share_transactions.query: SELECT * FROM Lots WHERE lot_id NOT IN (SELECT lot_id FROM Transactions_Lots)

cre_Theme_park.question: Which tourist attractions does the visitor with detail 'Vincent' visit?
cre_Theme_park.query: SELECT T2.Name FROM Visitors AS T1 JOIN Visits AS T3 ON T1.Tourist_ID  =  T3.Tourist_ID JOIN Tourist_Attractions AS T2 ON T3.Tourist_Attraction_ID  =  T2.Tourist_Attraction_ID WHERE T1.Tourist_Details  =  'Vincent'

cre_Theme_park.query: SELECT ta.Name, v.Visit_Date FROM Tourist_Attractions ta JOIN Visits v ON ta.Tourist_Attraction_ID = v.Tourist_Attraction_ID JOIN Visitors vis ON v.Tourist_ID = vis.Tourist_ID WHERE vis.Tourist_Details LIKE '%Vincent%' OR vis.Tourist_Details LIKE '%Vivian%'

cre_Theme_park.question: Show the transportation method most people choose to get to tourist attractions.

cre_Theme_park.question: Show different tourist attractions' names, ids, and the corresponding number of visits.
cre_Theme_park.query: SELECT T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID, T1.Name, COUNT(*) FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN Visits AS T2 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID = T2.Tourist_Attraction_ID GROUP BY T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID, T1.Name

cre_Theme_park.question: Show the names and ids of tourist attractions that are visited at least two times.
cre_Theme_park.query: SELECT T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID, T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN Visits AS T2 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID = T2.Tourist_Attraction_ID GROUP BY T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID, T1.Name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2

cre_Theme_park.question: Which tourist attractions are visited at least twice? Give me their names and ids.
cre_Theme_park.query: SELECT T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID, T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN Visits AS T2 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID = T2.Tourist_Attraction_ID GROUP BY T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2

cre_Theme_park.question: Show the names and ids of tourist attractions that are visited at most once.
cre_Theme_park.query: SELECT T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID, T1.Name FROM Tourist_Attractions AS T1 JOIN Visits AS T2 ON T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID = T2.Tourist_Attraction_ID GROUP BY T1.Tourist_Attraction_ID, T1.Name HAVING COUNT(*) <= 1

cre_Theme_park.question: What are the names and ids of the tourist attractions that are visited at most once?

cre_Theme_park.question: Find the tourist attractions that have parking or shopping as their feature details. What are the names of the attractions?

cre_Theme_park.question: What are the names of tourist attraction that Alison visited but Rosalind did not visit?

game_1.query: SELECT StuID FROM SportsInfo WHERE HoursPerWeek > 10 GROUP BY StuID HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SportsInfo GROUP BY StuID)

game_1.question: What is the first name and last name of the student who have most number of sports?
game_1.query: SELECT t1.fname, t1.lname FROM student AS t1 JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid GROUP BY t1.stuid ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

game_1.question: What is the first and last name of the student who played the most sports?
game_1.query: SELECT t1.fname, t1.lname FROM student AS t1 JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid ORDER BY t2.gamesplayed DESC LIMIT 1

game_1.question: Which sport has most number of students on scholarship?
game_1.query: SELECT SportName FROM SportsInfo WHERE OnScholarship = 1 GROUP BY SportName ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

game_1.question: What is the sport with the most scholarship students?
game_1.query: SELECT SportName FROM SportsInfo WHERE OnScholarship = 1 GROUP BY SportName ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

game_1.question: Show student ids who don't have any sports.
game_1.query: SELECT StuID FROM student WHERE StuID NOT IN (SELECT StuID FROM SportsInfo)

game_1.question: What are the ids of all students who don't play sports?
game_1.query: SELECT StuID FROM student WHERE StuID NOT IN (SELECT StuID FROM SportsInfo)

game_1.question: Show student ids who are on scholarship and have major 600.
game_1.query: SELECT StuID FROM SportsInfo WHERE OnScholarship = 1 AND StuID IN (SELECT StuID FROM Student WHERE Major = "600")

game_1.question: What are the student ids for those on scholarship in major number 600?
game_1.query: SELECT StuID FROM SportsInfo WHERE Major = "600" AND OnScholarship = 1

game_1.question: Show student ids who are female and play football.
game_1.query: SELECT t1.stuid FROM student AS t1 JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid WHERE t1.sex = "F" AND t2.sportname = "Football"

game_1.question: What are the ids of all female students who play football?
game_1.query: SELECT t1.stuid FROM student AS t1 JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid WHERE t1.sex = "F" AND t2.sportname = "Football"

game_1.question: Show all male student ids who don't play football.
game_1.query: SELECT t1.stuid FROM student AS t1 LEFT JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid WHERE t1.sex = "M" AND (t2.sportname != "Football" OR t2.sportname IS NULL)

game_1.question: What are the ids of all male students who do not play football?
game_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.stuid FROM student AS t1 LEFT JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid WHERE t1.sex = 'M' AND (t2.sportname IS NULL OR t2.sportname != 'Football')

game_1.question: Show total hours per week and number of games played for student David Shieber.
game_1.query: SELECT t1.HoursPerWeek, t1.GamesPlayed FROM SportsInfo AS t1 JOIN Student AS t2 ON t1.StuID = t2.StuID WHERE t2.Fname = "David" AND t2.Lname = "Shieber"

game_1.question: What is the total number of hours per work and number of games played by David Shieber?
game_1.query: SELECT SUM(t1.hoursperweek), t1.gamesplayed FROM sportsinfo AS t1 JOIN student AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid WHERE t2.fname = "David" AND t2.lname = "Shieber"

game_1.question: Show total hours per week and number of games played for students under 20.
game_1.query: SELECT SUM(t1.HoursPerWeek), SUM(t1.GamesPlayed) FROM SportsInfo AS t1 JOIN Student AS t2 ON t1.StuID = t2.StuID WHERE t2.Age < 20

game_1.question: What is the total number of hours per week and number of games played by students under 20?
game_1.query: SELECT SUM(t1.HoursPerWeek), SUM(t1.GamesPlayed) FROM SportsInfo AS t1 JOIN Student AS t2 ON t1.StuID = t2.StuID WHERE t2.Age < 20

game_1.question: How many students play video games?
game_1.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT StuID) FROM Plays_Games

game_1.question: How many different students play games?
game_1.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT StuID) FROM Plays_Games

game_1.question: Show ids of students who don't play video game.
game_1.query: SELECT StuID FROM student WHERE StuID NOT IN (SELECT StuID FROM plays_games)

game_1.question: What are the ids of all students who are not video game players?
game_1.query: SELECT StuID FROM student WHERE StuID NOT IN (SELECT StuID FROM plays_games)

game_1.question: Show ids of students who play video game and play sports.
game_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.StuID FROM Student AS t1 JOIN Plays_Games AS t2 ON t1.StuID  =  t2.StuID JOIN SportsInfo AS t3 ON t1.StuID  =  t3.StuID

game_1.question: What are the ids of all students who played video games and sports?
game_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.stuid FROM student AS t1 JOIN plays_games AS t2 ON t1.stuid  =  t2.stuid JOIN sportsinfo AS t3 ON t1.stuid  =  t3.stuid

game_1.question: Show all game ids and the number of hours played.
game_1.query: SELECT GameID, SUM(Hours_Played) FROM Plays_Games GROUP BY GameID

game_1.question: What are ids and total number of hours played for each game?
game_1.query: SELECT gameid, SUM(hours_played) FROM plays_games GROUP BY gameid

game_1.question: Show all student ids and the number of hours played.
game_1.query: SELECT StuID, SUM(Hours_Played) FROM Plays_Games GROUP BY StuID

game_1.question: What are the ids of all students and number of hours played?
game_1.query: SELECT StuID, SUM(Hours_Played) FROM Plays_Games GROUP BY StuID

game_1.question: Show the game name that has most number of hours played.
game_1.query: SELECT t2.gname FROM plays_games AS t1 JOIN video_games AS t2 ON t1.gameid = t2.gameid GROUP BY t1.gameid ORDER BY SUM(t1.hours_played) DESC LIMIT 1

game_1.question: What is the name of the game that has been played the most?
game_1.query: SELECT t1.gname FROM video_games AS t1 JOIN plays_games AS t2 ON t1.gameid = t2.gameid GROUP BY t1.gname ORDER BY SUM(t2.hours_played) DESC LIMIT 1

game_1.question: Show all game names played by at least 1000 hours.
game_1.query: SELECT GName FROM video_games AS t1 JOIN plays_games AS t2 ON t1.gameid  =  t2.gameid GROUP BY t2.gameid HAVING SUM(t2.hours_played) >= 1000

game_1.question: What are the names of all the games that have been played for at least 1000 hours?
game_1.query: SELECT GName FROM video_games AS t1 JOIN plays_games AS t2 ON t1.gameid = t2.gameid GROUP BY t1.gname HAVING SUM(t2.hours_played) >= 1000

game_1.question: Show all game names played by Linda Smith
game_1.query: SELECT t2.gname FROM video_games AS t1 JOIN plays_games AS t2 ON t1.gameid  =  t2.gameid JOIN student AS t3 ON t2.stuid  =  t3.stuid WHERE t3.fname  =  "Linda" AND t3.lname  =  "Smith"

game_1.question: What are the names of all games played by Linda Smith?
game_1.query: SELECT t2.gname FROM video_games AS t2 JOIN plays_games AS t1 ON t1.gameid  =  t2.gameid JOIN student AS t3 ON t1.stuid  =  t3.stuid WHERE t3.fname  =  "Linda" AND t3.lname  =  "Smith"

game_1.question: Find the last and first name of students who are playing Football or Lacrosse.
game_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.lname, t1.fname FROM student AS t1 JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid WHERE t2.sportname IN ("Football", "Lacrosse")

game_1.question: What is the first and last name of all students who play Football or Lacrosse?
game_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.fname, t1.lname FROM student AS t1 JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid WHERE t2.sportname IN ('Football', 'Lacrosse')

game_1.question: Find the first name and age of the students who are playing both Football and Lacrosse.
game_1.query: SELECT t1.fname, t1.age FROM student AS t1 JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid WHERE t2.sportname = "Football" AND t1.stuid IN (SELECT stuid FROM sportsinfo WHERE sportname = "Lacrosse")

game_1.question: What are the first names and ages of all students who are playing both Football and Lacrosse?
game_1.query: SELECT t1.fname, t1.age FROM student AS t1 JOIN sportsinfo AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid WHERE t2.sportname = 'Football' AND t1.stuid IN (SELECT stuid FROM sportsinfo WHERE sportname = 'Lacrosse')

game_1.question: Find the last name and gender of the students who are playing both Call of Destiny and Works of Widenius games.
game_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT t1.lname, t1.sex FROM student AS t1 JOIN plays_games AS t2 ON t1.stuid  =  t2.stuid JOIN video_games AS t3 ON t2.gameid  =  t3.gameid WHERE t3.gname  =  "Call of Destiny" AND t1.stuid IN (SELECT t2.stuid FROM plays_games AS t2 JOIN video_games AS t3 ON t2.gameid  =  t3.gameid WHERE t3.gname  =  "Works of Widenius")

game_1.question: what is the last name and gender of all students who played both Call of Destiny and Works of Widenius?
game_1.query: SELECT t1.lname, t1.sex FROM student AS t1 JOIN plays_games AS t2 ON t1.stuid = t2.stuid JOIN video_games AS t3 ON t2.gameid = t3.gameid WHERE t3.gname = 'Call of Destiny' AND t1.stuid IN (SELECT t2.stuid FROM plays_games AS t2 JOIN video_games AS t3 ON t2.gameid = t3.gameid WHERE t3.gname = 'Works of Widenius')

game_1.question: Show all video game types.
game_1.query: SELECT DISTINCT GType FROM Video_Games

customers_and_addresses.question: Which payment method is used by most customers?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT payment_method, COUNT(*) AS num_customers FROM customers GROUP BY payment_method ORDER BY num_customers DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the payment method that is used most frequently.

customers_and_addresses.question: What are the names of customers using the most popular payment method?

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the name of the customers who use the most frequently used payment method.

customers_and_addresses.question: How many customers are living in city "Lake Geovannyton"?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT customer_id) FROM customer_addresses JOIN addresses ON customer_addresses.address_id = addresses.address_id WHERE city = 'Lake Geovannyton' AND date_address_to IS NULL

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the number of customers who live in the city called Lake Geovannyton.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) FROM customer_addresses JOIN addresses ON customer_addresses.address_id = addresses.address_id WHERE city = 'Lake Geovannyton'

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the name of customers who are living in Colorado?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_addresses AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN addresses AS T3 ON T2.address_id = T3.address_id WHERE T3.state_province_county = 'Colorado'

customers_and_addresses.question: What are the names of customers who live in Colorado state?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_addresses AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN addresses AS T3 ON T2.address_id = T3.address_id WHERE state_province_county = 'Colorado'

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the list of cities that no customer is living in.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM addresses WHERE city NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT city FROM customer_addresses JOIN addresses ON customer_addresses.address_id = addresses.address_id)

customers_and_addresses.question: What are the cities no customers live in?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM addresses WHERE city NOT IN (SELECT city FROM customer_addresses JOIN addresses ON customer_addresses.address_id = addresses.address_id)

customers_and_addresses.question: Which city has the most customers living in?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS num_customers FROM addresses JOIN customer_addresses ON addresses.address_id = customer_addresses.address_id GROUP BY city ORDER BY num_customers DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the city where the most customers live.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT city FROM addresses AS T1 JOIN customer_addresses AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id GROUP BY city ORDER BY count(DISTINCT T2.customer_id) DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: Retrieve the list of all cities.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT city FROM addresses

customers_and_addresses.question: List all the distinct cities

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the contact channel code that was used by the customer named "Tillman Ernser".

customers_and_addresses.question: What is the "active to date" of the latest contact channel used by "Tillman Ernser"?

customers_and_addresses.question: Return the the "active to date" of the latest contact channel used by the customer named "Tillman Ernser".
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT MAX(active_to_date) FROM customer_contact_channels AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.customer_name = 'Tillman Ernser'

customers_and_addresses.question: What is the average time span of contact channels in the database?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT avg(DATEDIFF(active_to_date, active_from_date)) FROM customer_contact_channels

customers_and_addresses.question: Compute the average active time span of contact channels.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT avg(DATEDIFF(active_to_date, active_from_date)) FROM customer_contact_channels

customers_and_addresses.question: What is the channel code and contact number of the customer contact channel that was active for the longest time?

customers_and_addresses.question: Return the channel code and contact number of the customer contact channel whose active duration was the longest.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT channel_code, contact_number FROM customer_contact_channels WHERE active_to_date - active_from_date = (SELECT MAX(active_to_date - active_from_date) FROM customer_contact_channels)

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the name and active date of the customer that use email as the contact channel.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.customer_name, T2.active_from_date FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_contact_channels AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.channel_code = 'email'

customers_and_addresses.question: What are the name and active date of the customers whose contact channel code is email?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.customer_name, T2.active_from_date FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_contact_channels AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.channel_code = 'email'

customers_and_addresses.question: What is the name of the customer that made the order with the largest quantity?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T2.customer_name FROM customer_orders AS T1 JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN (SELECT order_id, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 1) AS T3 ON T1.order_id = T3.order_id

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the name of the customer who made the order of the largest amount of goods.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T2.order_id = T3.order_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY SUM(T3.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: What is the name of the customer that has purchased the most items?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T2.order_id = T3.order_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY SUM(T3.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: Give me the name of the customer who ordered the most items in total.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T2.order_id = T3.order_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY sum(T3.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: What is the payment method of the customer that has purchased the least quantity of items?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.payment_method FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T2.order_id = T3.order_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY sum(T3.order_quantity) ASC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: Tell me the payment method used by the customer who ordered the least amount of goods in total.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.payment_method FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T2.order_id = T3.order_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY SUM(T3.order_quantity) ASC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: How many types of products have Rodrick Heaney bought in total?

customers_and_addresses.question: What is the total quantity of products purchased by "Rodrick Heaney"?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT SUM(order_quantity) FROM order_items JOIN customer_orders ON order_items.order_id = customer_orders.order_id JOIN customers ON customer_orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name = 'Rodrick Heaney'

customers_and_addresses.question: Tell me the total quantity of products bought by the customer called "Rodrick Heaney".

customers_and_addresses.question: What are the customer name and date of the orders whose status is "Delivered".

customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT sum(order_quantity) FROM order_items WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Cancelled')

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the total quantity of products associated with the orders in the "Cancelled" status.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT sum(T2.order_quantity) FROM customer_orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.order_id  =  T2.order_id WHERE T1.order_status  =  'Cancelled'

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the total amount of products ordered before 2018-03-17 07:13:53.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT sum(order_quantity) FROM order_items JOIN customer_orders ON order_items.order_id = customer_orders.order_id WHERE customer_orders.order_date < '2018-03-17 07:13:53'

customers_and_addresses.question: What is the total amount of products purchased before 2018-03-17 07:13:53?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT sum(T1.order_quantity) FROM order_items AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.order_id  =  T2.order_id WHERE T2.order_date < '2018-03-17 07:13:53'

customers_and_addresses.question: Who made the latest order?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id ORDER BY T2.order_date DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the name of the customer who made an order most recently.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: Which product has been ordered most number of times?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.product_details FROM products AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id GROUP BY T1.product_id ORDER BY sum(T2.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: What is the most frequently ordered product? Tell me the detail of the product
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.product_details FROM products AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.product_id  =  T2.product_id GROUP BY T1.product_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the name and ID of the product whose total order quantity is the largest.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.product_id, T1.product_details, sum(T2.order_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id GROUP BY T1.product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: What are the name and ID of the product bought the most.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.product_details, T2.product_id FROM products AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id GROUP BY T2.product_id ORDER BY SUM(T2.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 1

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the names of customers who never ordered product Latte.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_orders JOIN order_items ON customer_orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE product_details = 'Latte')

customers_and_addresses.question: What are names of customers who never ordered product Latte.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_orders JOIN order_items ON customer_orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE product_details = 'Latte')

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the names of customers who never placed an order.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_orders)

customers_and_addresses.question: What are the names of customers who never made an order.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_orders)

customers_and_addresses.question: Find the names of customers who ordered both products Latte and Americano.
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T2.order_id = T3.order_id JOIN products AS T4 ON T3.product_id = T4.product_id WHERE T4.product_details IN ('Latte', 'Americano') GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT T4.product_details) = 2

customers_and_addresses.question: What are the names of customers who have purchased both products Latte and Americano?
customers_and_addresses.query: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T2.order_id  =  T3.order_id JOIN products AS T4 ON T3.product_id  =  T4.product_id WHERE T4.product_name  IN  ('Latte', 'Americano') GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(DISTINCT T4.product_name)  =  2

roller_coaster.question: How many roller coasters are there?
List the names of roller coasters by ascending order of length.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT Name FROM roller_coaster ORDER BY Length ASC

roller_coaster.question: What are the lengths and heights of roller coasters?
List the names of countries whose language is not "German".
roller_coaster.query: SELECT country.Name FROM country WHERE country.Country_ID NOT IN (SELECT roller_coaster.Country_ID FROM roller_coaster INNER JOIN country ON roller_coaster.Country_ID = country.Country_ID WHERE country.Languages = "German")

roller_coaster.question: Show the statuses of roller coasters longer than 3300 or higher than 100.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT Status FROM roller_coaster WHERE Length > 3300 OR Height > 100

roller_coaster.question: What are the speeds of the longest roller coaster?
roller_coaster.query: SELECT Speed FROM roller_coaster ORDER BY Length DESC LIMIT 1

roller_coaster.question: What is the average speed of roller coasters?
Show the different statuses and the numbers of roller coasters for each status.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT Status, COUNT(*) FROM roller_coaster GROUP BY Status

roller_coaster.question: Please show the most common status of roller coasters.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT Status FROM roller_coaster GROUP BY Status ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

roller_coaster.question: List the status shared by more than two roller coaster.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT Status FROM roller_coaster GROUP BY Status HAVING COUNT(*) > 2

roller_coaster.question: Show the park of the roller coaster with the highest speed.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT Park FROM roller_coaster WHERE Speed = (SELECT MAX(Speed) FROM roller_coaster)

roller_coaster.question: Show the names of roller coasters and names of country they are in.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT roller_coaster.Name, country.Name FROM roller_coaster JOIN country ON roller_coaster.Country_ID = country.Country_ID

roller_coaster.question: Show the names of countries that have more than one roller coaster.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT country.Name FROM country JOIN roller_coaster ON country.Country_ID = roller_coaster.Country_ID GROUP BY country.Name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

roller_coaster.question: Show the name and population of the country that has the highest roller coaster.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT country.Name, country.Population FROM country JOIN roller_coaster ON country.Country_ID = roller_coaster.Country_ID WHERE roller_coaster.Height = (SELECT MAX(Height) FROM roller_coaster)

roller_coaster.question: Show the names of countries and the average speed of roller coasters from each country.
roller_coaster.query: SELECT country.Name, AVG(roller_coaster.Speed) FROM roller_coaster JOIN country ON roller_coaster.Country_ID = country.Country_ID GROUP BY country.Name

roller_coaster.question: How many countries do not have an roller coaster longer than 3000?
roller_coaster.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM country WHERE Country_ID NOT IN (SELECT Country_ID FROM roller_coaster WHERE Length > 3000)

roller_coaster.question: What are the country names, area and population which has both roller coasters with speed higher
roller_coaster.query:
SELECT country.Name, country.Area, country.Population FROM country 
INNER JOIN roller_coaster ON country.Country_ID = roller_coaster.Country_ID 
WHERE roller_coaster.Speed > 100 AND roller_coaster.Height > 50 
GROUP BY country.Name, country.Area, country.Population 
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT roller_coaster.Roller_Coaster_ID) > 1
